job_name: 【眼科儀器】北區業務代表
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
關於職缺
公司致力於大中華眼科事業發展，本著專業化的經營理念，以“設備最全、服務至上”享譽國內眼科界，不斷引進國外先進眼科設備，與全體眼科醫師攜手並進，將全華人眼科推向一流水平的目標而努力。

職位提供服務
這個角色對於公司至關重要，因為它直接關聯到市場的業務拓展和客戶關係管理。我們需要一位專業的業務代表來開發新客戶、維護現有客戶，並確保達成業績目標。通過這個角色，我們希望提升市場佔比，增強品牌影響力，並保持與客戶的長期合作關係。

獲得成就
■積極尋找和接洽新客戶，提供優質的服務以保持現有客戶的滿意度，並確保訂單和帳務的準確處理。
■了解市場需求，掌握行業趨勢，並迅速響應客戶需求，解決問題，從而提升銷售業績和客戶忠誠度。

成長機會
公司將為您提供專業的培訓和發展機會，幫助您提升業務技能和行業知識。隨著您在工作中的表現和業績提升，您將有機會參與更高層次的業務策略規劃，甚至晉升到更高級別的管理職位。

工作內容
■從事眼科儀器設備的銷售並達成銷售目標。
■開發並維護診所、醫院等客戶，建立並鞏固客戶關係。
■負責國內業務的接洽、訂單處理、帳務管理以及客情維護，確保業務流程順利。
■處理責任區域內的異常報告，及時解決問題以維護公司形象。
■掌握市場變化，提供解決方案，協助客戶解決問題並提供專業建議。

期待條件
■專科以上畢業，英文聽說讀寫順暢
■具醫療保健相關工作經驗者佳
■重視團隊合作
■歡迎社會新鮮人及無經驗者

關於團隊
我們的團隊專注於提供高品質的眼科設備和服務解決方案，致力於滿足客戶多樣化的需求。我們重視創新和技術進步，並以客戶滿意度為中心，不斷追求卓越和行業領先地位。


About the Job
We are dedicated to advancing ophthalmology in Greater China with a focus on professionalism, comprehensive equipment, and top-notch service. We continuously introduce advanced international ophthalmic equipment and collaborate with ophthalmologists to elevate Chinese ophthalmology to top-tier standards.

Why We Have This Role
This role is vital for expanding market presence and managing client relationships. We need a sales representative to attract new clients, maintain existing ones, and meet performance targets, aiming to increase market share, enhance brand influence, and ensure long-term client partnerships.

How You'll Find Success
■Proactively acquire new clients and provide excellent service to retain existing ones, ensuring accurate order and account handling.
■Understand market demands and trends, respond quickly to client needs, and solve problems to boost sales and client loyalty.

How You Grow
The company offers professional training and development to improve your business skills and industry knowledge. With strong performance, you'll have opportunities for higher-level strategy roles and senior management positions.

Things You Will Do
■Sell ophthalmic instruments and achieve sales targets.
■Develop and maintain relationships with clinics, hospitals, and other clients.
■Handle domestic business dealings, order processing, account management, and client relations.
■Address issues in your area and provide timely solutions to maintain the company’s image.
■Stay updated on market changes and offer solutions and professional advice to clients.

What We're Looking for on Your Resume
■Diploma or higher, fluent in English.
■Healthcare-related experience is a plus.
■Team-oriented.
■Open to fresh graduates and those without prior experience.

What You Should Know About This Team
Our team provides high-quality ophthalmic equipment and services, focusing on client satisfaction, innovation, and industry leadership.

raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 桃竹苗醫療業務專員(擴編)
company_name: 雄鷹有限公司
job_description:
美國美敦力神經外科儀器設備及耗材台灣代理推廣
美國Pilling Weck精密手術器械經銷推廣
凱瑞斯負壓機器與傷口敷料台灣區代理推廣

1. 開發與維護客戶關係：拓展市場並增加市場成長率，確保公司產品在市場中的競爭力。
2. 建立長期合作夥伴關係：培養並鞏固與客戶之間的信任與合作，促進雙方長期合作。
3. 產品資訊提供與市場反應：為客戶提供全面的產品資訊，快速回應客戶的需求及市場變化。
4. 產品介紹與使用示範：安排產品介紹會議並示範使用方法，確保客戶對產品的充分了解。
5. 手術協助：具備開刀房跟刀經驗者佳，協助醫生使用公司醫療設備。
6. 醫院內業務處理：包括報價、議價、招標及設備維修等事務，確保醫院內的需求得到快速滿足。
7.每日回報：詳細向主管匯報當區的市場狀況，確保信息的及時傳遞。

公司優勢
在雄鷹有限公司，隨著工作時間的積累，您將逐漸體會到公司卓越的企業文化和豐厚的成長機會。只要您有能力並且願意努力，賺取高薪不再是遙不可及的夢想。

發展前景
公司致力於培養有實力的專業人才，提供完整的教育訓練課程，無經驗者亦可快速上手。我們提供有潛力的員工快速晉升的機會，年薪百萬不是夢想。

職位要求
應屆畢業生亦可加入，歡迎有志在醫療行業發展的人才。
大學或研究所畢業，科系不限，但具備醫藥護理相關背景或濃厚興趣者優先考慮。
自備小客車，公司提供汽車及手機津貼、油資實支實付等福利。

加入我們
如果您渴望在一個支持創新與專業成長的環境中工作，雄鷹有限公司就是您的最佳選擇。讓我們一起開創成功的未來！

job_name: 中區臨床應用業務專員 Clinical Application Specialist
company_name: 科明儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
Things You Will Do
•臨床作業: 協助醫師完成手術病患的接待與跟刀，執行專業衛教諮詢任務，進行手術觀察，培訓醫護人員，並確保設備校準。
•客戶導向: 定期了解及關懷病患回饋、收集資訊、並優化衛教品質，處理客戶詢問並解決問題。
•績效管理: 確保手術質與量的完成，追蹤績效指標，達成績效目標，並與跨部門團隊合作。
•管理並維護醫院/診所儀器與設備
•管理耗材帳務及病患費用的清點


What We're Looking For on Your Resume
具備醫療器材操作經驗，或對醫療器材產業擁有熱情與興趣，能快速學習新技術，並具備優良的溝通能力。同時，我們也期待您擁有團隊合作精神、問題解決能力，以及對市場的敏銳洞察力。

歡迎渴望從護理/醫療工作轉換至充滿活力的專業人才

About the Job
加入科明臨床團隊，你會成為眼科手術室不可或缺的一員。你將深入參與最先進的眼科手術機器操作與維護，透過臨床跟刀與機器教學，確保每一台手術機器都處於最佳狀態，為我們的客戶與視覺病患提供最精確、安全的醫療服務，成為人們擁有清晰光明視界的重要推手。

Why We Have This Role
科明引領了先進與精準的眼科儀器設備在台灣。為確保市場端客戶使用體驗上的絕對精準，並提供患者優質醫療服務;臨床應用專員，臨床應用專員將在現場服務以專業的技術和咨詢，並與醫師、工程師及業務團隊緊密合作，為客戶及患者帶來令人信賴的醫療服務品質。

How You'll Find Success
• 持續學習： 和團隊不斷在專業和經驗中學習，你將成為領域內的專家。
• 精益求精： 透過精準的儀器校正和細心的客戶服務，提升醫療品質。
• 團隊合作： 和一群對專業有熱忱的當責團隊伙伴，完勝每年目標。
• 伙伴關係： 以開拓進取的積極態度擔任我們的外部培訓師、和醫師建立互相支持的關係

How You'll Grow
透過持續的產品培訓與臨床跟刀的經驗，你將會深入了解我們眼科產品的應用範圍，並不斷提升臨床應用的專業知識，我們的團隊角色多元且專業，在內部做職涯的探索或是深耕專業發展為培訓專家，都是可以期許的成長機會。

What You Should Know About This Team
這個團隊年輕且充滿活力。在科明儀器，我們執行work hard and play hard不遺餘力。快速學習，確保品質，始終記得誠信是經營的唯一之道，除此之外，請享受並展現對專業的熱情、還有工作中彼此信任的和諧歡樂模式。


About the Job
By joining our team, you will become an indispensable member of our ophthalmic operating room. You will be deeply involved in the operation and maintenance of state-of-the-art ophthalmic surgical equipment. Through clinical shadowing and equipment training, you will ensure that every surgical machine is in optimal condition, providing our clients and visually impaired patients with the most precise and safe medical services. You will be a crucial part of helping people achieve clear and bright vision.

Why We Have This Role
As a Clinical Application Specialist and be part of a team dedicated to revolutionizing ophthalmic care in Taiwan. You will provide on-site technical support and consultation to our clients, ensuring that our advanced ophthalmic equipment is used to its full potential. This role offers a unique opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology and contribute to improving patient outcomes.

How You'll Find Success
• Continuous Learning: By continuously learning and growing with our team, you will become an expert in your field.
• Striving for Excellence: Through precise instrument calibration and meticulous customer service, you will enhance the quality of medical care.
• Teamwork: Collaborate with a dedicated team of professionals to achieve annual targets.
• Partnerships: Take an initiative role as an external trainer and build supportive relationships with physicians.

How You'll Grow
With ongoing product training and hands-on clinical experience, you will develop a comprehensive understanding of our ophthalmic product applications. Our team fosters a diverse and supportive environment, allowing you to explore various career paths within our company, such as becoming a training expert or deepening your specialized knowledge.

Things You Will Do
• Clinical Operations: Conduct surgical observations, train medical staff, and ensure equipment calibration.
• Customer Focus: Build and maintain strong customer relationships, addressing inquiries and resolving issues.
• Performance Management: Track performance metrics, conduct self-assessments, and collaborate with cross-functional teams.
• Market Insights: Analyze market trends and contribute to strategic planning.
 
What We're Looking For on Your Resume
With experience in medical device operation or a strong passion and interest in the medical device industry, you are able to quickly learn new technologies and possess excellent communication skills. Additionally, we seek candidates with a collaborative spirit, problem-solving abilities, and a keen eye for market trends.

We encourage candidates with a sales-oriented mindset to apply. This role is perfect for those seeking a dynamic career change from nursing or other medical fields.

四、招考職缺及條件：【心導管室技術員(放射師)】
（一）學歷：專科以上放射科系畢業。
（二）具備證照：放射師執照。
（三）經歷：無。
（四）其他條件：
1.到職後需取得ACLS證書。
2.需上手術台協助醫師進行心導管檢查與治療(需穿鉛衣)。
3.可接受24小時輪班制度。
4.需接受總院心導管室技術員訓練。
五、工作項目:
（一）工作責任：
1.平常上班時間於心導管室協助病患準備心導管檢查事宜。
2.負責操作心導管設備，協助醫師進行心導管檢查與治療。
3.協助心導管室裝備管理及保養。
4.與其他心導管室人員輪流值班。
5.協助心臟內科其餘檢查事務。
6.心導管室之評鑑相關事務。
（二）職務內容：
1.其他主管交辦事項。
2.於心導管室協助病患準備心導管檢查事宜。
3.負責操作心導管設備，須穿鉛衣，手術台上協助醫師進行心導管檢查與治療。
4.心導管術後之移除導引鞘及止血。
5.心導管書面報告之整理與歸檔。
6.影像報告之製作及擷取，光碟片燒錄歸檔。
7.協助心導管室裝備及衛材管理及保養。
8.與其他心導管室人員輪流值班（24小時值班制度）。
9.值班期間可不住在醫院內，但為因應責任急救醫院評鑑，需於通知後30分鐘內到達醫院。
六、薪資與福利：試用期及正式進用以聘一等一級48,790起薪（含地域加給）。年終獎金比照軍公教人員發放標準，本院員工有勞健保、住院期間享有病房費優待，休假制度依勞基法規定。
七、考試項目：
（一）筆試（選擇題、問答或申論）及口試。
（二）命題範圍：心臟解剖學、基本放射學、高級心臟救命術（ACLS）、基本心電圖判讀及緊急處置。
八、錄取標準：筆試70%、口試30%，筆、面試成績任一單項未達60分者不予錄取，總成績相同者以筆試成績高者優先錄取。
九、檢附資料：個人簡歷、身分證正反面影本、最高學歷證明影本、證書影本、服務證明影本等。【郵寄澎湖縣馬公市前寮里90號，國防醫學院三軍總醫院澎湖分院 醫務行政室 人事招募員吳小姐收】。
十、一般規定：經考試通過但具有下列1至8項情形之ㄧ者，不得辦理進用：
（一）檢附資料不全或不合格者。
（二）通緝在案尚未結案者。
（三）受有期徒刑之宣告，尚未結案或緩刑在案者。
（四）受「監護宣告」及「輔助宣告」，尚未撤銷者。
（五）大陸地區人民經許可進入臺灣地區，非在臺灣地區設有戶籍滿20年者或香港及澳門居民經許可進入臺灣地區，非在臺灣地區設有戶籍滿10者。
（六）曾犯內亂外患罪經判決確定或曾服公職有貪污行為經判決確定或依法停止任用、受休職處分尚未期滿者。
（七）違反國籍法規定者。
（八）曾於公務機關或國防單位任軍、文職期間有思想、品德、操守等不良記錄者。
（九）依「國軍生產及服務作業醫療事業基金聘雇人員管理作業規定」：通過本分院各類聘雇人員進用必須為單一『中華民國國籍』者，方可辦理進用。
十一、聯絡電話及聯絡人：06-9211116#59923人事招募員吳小姐。(請於週一至週五0800~1200；1300~1700時間內來電)。

EyePlus 眼視光集團擁有優良且舒適的工作環境，位在台北中山區及大安區交通便利、住商混合的民權院及大安院；環抱永和區八二三紀念公園(四號公園)的雙和院；林口區及龜山區比鄰三井Outlet購物商城的林口院及龜山院；桃園區展演中心旁的桃園院，距離捷運站或公車站僅3~5分鐘路程。

EyePlus 眼視光集團注重專業能力訓練培養，由醫師、護理師、視光師、藥師與相關廠商定期培訓，完善的成長與自主空間，更注重團隊工作的和諧默契與愉悅氛圍，與大家共同成就工作與生活的理想狀態，歡迎優秀人才加入我們的行列！

job_name: 【科林】Sales Representative 醫療業務代表 (南區)
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
<關於職缺>
科林助聽器為業界聽覺輔具的領導品牌，秉持著不斷創新與進步的理念，積極拓展市場
科林榮獲2020國家磐石獎: https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764

<職位提供服務>
提供全方位的視聽保健服務，促進全球華人的耳聰目明
科林微電影: 
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<獲得成就> 
隨著市場需求的增加和業務目標的擴大，推動團隊業績的增長，並且協助培訓和提升團隊的專業技能。這個角色對於實現業務增長和擴展市場具有關鍵作用。

<成長機會>
在這個角色中，你將有機會發展出色的領導和策略制定技能。你的領導能力和策劃能力。你需要有效地帶領團隊達成月度、季度和年度的業績目標，同時提供專業的培訓以提升團隊的業務能力。通過策畫和督導社區活動、醫院合作及其他業務拓展策略，你將能夠顯著提升團隊的績效和公司的市場份額。

<工作內容>
1、醫院及診所客戶關係經營及開發
2、舉辦醫院與診所之服務說明會
3、開發其他相關醫療照護機構
4、協助醫院招標案
【註 】底薪外另有額外業績獎金

<期待特質>
- 強大的領導能力和業務策略制定經驗。
- 優秀的溝通和團隊合作能力，能夠有效地培訓和激勵下屬。
- 具備策劃和實施社區和醫療機構合作活動的經驗。
- 能夠有效地推動業績增長和市場拓展。
- 有醫療相關領域的經驗者優先考慮。

<關於團隊>
我們的團隊是一個充滿活力和合作精神的集體，致力於實現業績目標和業務增長。我們重視每位成員的貢獻，並提供充分的支持和資源來幫助大家達成目標。我們期待那些具有領導力、積極進取並願意接受挑戰的人加入我們的團隊，共同推動業務發展和市場擴展。

<About the Job>
Clinico Group is a leading brand in the hearing aid industry, committed to continuous innovation and progress while actively expanding the market. Clinico Group was honored with the National Rock Award in 2020: 
https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764

<Why We Have This Role>
To provide comprehensive auditory and visual health services, enhancing the hearing and vision of Chinese communities worldwide.
Short films:
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<How You'll Find Success>
With the increasing market demand and the expansion of business objectives, this role is crucial in driving team performance growth and supporting the training and enhancement of the team's professional skills. It plays a key role in achieving business growth and market expansion.

<How You Grow>
In this position, you will have the chance to develop exceptional leadership and strategic planning skills. You will be responsible for effectively leading the team to meet monthly, quarterly, and annual performance targets while providing professional training to enhance the team's business capabilities. Through planning and overseeing community events, hospital collaborations, and other business development strategies, you will significantly boost the team's performance and increase the company's market share.

<Things You Will Do>

1. Build and maintain strong connections with existing and potential hospital and clinic partners.
2. Conduct informative sessions at hospitals and clinics to present services and products.
3. Explore and establish relationships with additional relevant healthcare providers.
4. Support hospitals in their bidding processes for various projects.

**Note**: In addition to a base salary, there are additional performance-based bonuses.

<What We're Looking for on Your Resume>

-Strong Leadership and Strategic Planning Experience
- Excellent Communication and Teamwork Skills
- Experience in Community and Healthcare Collaboration
-Proven Ability to Drive Performance and Market Expansion
-Preference for Healthcare Experience

<What You Should Know About This Team>
Our sales team is vibrant and enthusiastic, embodying the dynamic spirit of Clinico. We are committed to upholding our core values of innovation, integrity, quality, collaboration, and sustainability. Joining us means becoming part of a team that thrives on creativity, teamwork, and a shared commitment to making a positive impact in our industry.

raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

台灣人口結構翻轉    
2018成為“高齡社會”   
2025成為“超高齡社會”

強生公司創立於1988年，
主要為歐洲及美國等10個不同國家的輔具的台灣總代理，
我們致力於協助長照家庭擺脫傳統長照現況，
想邀請對於長照產業有興趣，
同時對服務“人”有熱情的工作夥伴

南區連鎖通路(嘉義=>台東)。

長期照顧相關的『輔具』但銷售的不僅是輔具，而是透過專業來利用輔具解決客戶的問題。

如未來想挑戰自己也歡迎轉職業務。

job_name: 【整形外科事業處】北區產品專員
company_name: 沃醫學股份有限公司
job_description:
結合外科醫學與市場，打造精準產品行銷策略！

我們正在尋找對整形外科與醫療產品行銷有興趣的產品專員，負責整形相關耗材、醫療儀器的市場規劃、銷售與教育訓練，並與醫師密切合作，確保產品能有效應用於臨床實務。

【工作內容】
1. 產品銷售規劃與行銷策略：負責整形外科相關產品（如義乳植入物、耗材、超音波儀器等）的市場行銷規劃，並評估行銷效益，制定最適銷售策略。
2. 醫學專業與市場整合：參與整形手術觀摩，學習醫學專業知識，並協助產品行銷整合，以提升市場競爭力。
3. 醫學文獻研究與資訊整合：具備良好的英文能力與專業背景，能閱讀醫學文獻，並有效整理與轉化醫療專業資訊。
4. 醫師需求分析與問題解決：協助業務代表深入了解醫師需求，提供產品支援並解決臨床問題。
5. 內外部產品教育訓練：負責公司內部團隊與客戶端的產品教育，確保醫療人員與銷售團隊具備完整產品知識。
6. 臨床支援：協助醫療團隊進行臨床相關工作，確保產品在醫療現場的應用符合標準並發揮最佳效能。
7. 跨部門協作：協助執行公司內部相關專案與部門任務，確保產品管理與市場行銷策略順利推動。
8. 學習與成長：無經驗可，但需具備高度學習企圖心，並具良好簡報與溝通能力，能有效向內外部團隊傳遞專業資訊。

【我們希望您具備】
• 醫學、美容醫學、生物科技、醫療器材、護理或相關科系背景者尤佳
• 具醫療產品行銷、醫療器材銷售經驗者優先，但無經驗可培訓
• 熟悉醫學文獻閱讀與資訊整合，可將專業知識應用於市場策略與教育訓練
• 良好的溝通能力與簡報技巧，能有效與醫師、業務團隊及行銷部門合作
• 積極學習，願意投入醫療產業發展，並勇於接受挑戰

【福利與發展機會】
1. 深入參與整形外科市場，學習最新醫學技術與產品應用
2. 提供完整醫學知識與行銷技能培訓，快速累積專業經驗
3. 與國際知名大廠合作，拓展專業視野與人脈
4. 穩定發展機會，晉升管道順暢

如果您對於整形外科產品、市場行銷與醫療產業有高度興趣，並希望發展醫學專業與產品管理技能，歡迎加入我們，成為整外業界專業的產品專員！

 1) 在整個術前至術後期間提供護理和協助 NB 植牙手術方案，以及加深對NB系統手術方案的理解
 2) 根據客戶及其團隊需求提供一對一的護理師培訓，包括：
 ・ 植牙護理師的角色
 ・ 無菌和交叉感染控制
 ・ 手術協助
 ・ 術後指導與護理
 ・ 手術後清潔消毒
 ・ 庫存控制、分配與監控
 ・ 設備儀器的熟悉與保養
 ・ 向病人傳達植牙治療的不同步驟
 ・ 有效管理 Nobel Biocare 庫存，包括訂購和換貨程序
 3) 協助行銷材料的庫存和庫存管理，例如小冊子、訓練套件、贈品等
 4) 協助培訓/行銷活動設置和材料準備
 5) 協助行銷行政工作（如分配）
 6) 會議、展覽等特殊任務的支援

job_name: (北部)醫療業務代表
company_name: 瑪克多股份有限公司
job_description:
1. 根據公司策略規劃負責區域的業務計畫及執行，並積極達成年度區域業績目標；
2. 與醫院、醫師建立長期的合作夥伴關係；
3. 提供客戶正確詳實的產品資訊與產品知識，並迅速反應客戶之意見及市場資訊；
4. 定期拜訪客戶，維繫穩定客戶關係；
5. 即時提供最新的競爭者資訊，以利彈性調整銷售戰術與精進戰略；
6. 配合市場行銷活動，如展覽、會議等；
7. 熟悉產品知識、特性與利益並通過年度相關考核。

醫藥業務代表是公司與客戶之間的橋樑，負責推廣公司產品、維護客戶關係及維持公司形象。這個職位的重要性在於能夠直接影響公司的業績，同時也有很好的發展前景。
手術過程極其重要，瑪克多的動態影像同軸紀錄與即時遠距協作，可有效提升手術團隊協能力，也可使手術教學與案例發表更加生動，歡迎對於醫療有熱情與符合條件的朋友們，一起來共創未來。
具備醫療設備或耗材的銷售經驗尤佳。

job_name: 【健康醫學事業處】中區業務專員(保障底薪+高額獎金+油資補助)
company_name: 沃醫學股份有限公司
job_description:
開拓市場，推動醫療設備技術！

我們正在尋找積極主動、擅長市場開發的健康醫學業務專員，負責醫療院所的開發與銷售推廣，提供專業的醫療設備解決方案，為醫療團隊帶來更高效的診療技術。

【工作內容】
1. 市場開發與客戶關係維護：負責骨復健科、婦產科等醫療院所之業務拓展，維持穩定客戶關係，並開發區域內新客源。
2. 醫療設備銷售：推廣並銷售超音波設備、磁波設備、婦產科雷射設備等高端醫療儀器與產品，提升醫療院所的診斷/治療效率。
3. 產品簡報與臨床支援：獨立進行產品簡報、示範操作指導與跟診協助，確保醫療團隊充分理解並正確應用設備。
4. 市場競爭分析：分析市場上競爭產品動態，擬定因應策略，提升產品競爭力與市場占有率。
5. 業績目標達成：規劃銷售策略，與團隊合作，確保達成預定業績目標。
6. 醫院採購流程熟悉度（加分項）：有醫療儀器銷售經驗或熟悉醫院採購流程者佳，能提升銷售效率與成功率。

【我們希望您具備】
• 具備醫療器材、健康醫學、骨復健設備、電波或雷射儀器等銷售經驗者優先
• 具備市場開發能力，能夠獨立拓展醫療院所合作機會
• 良好的溝通與簡報能力，能與醫療專業人員有效交流
• 對醫療產業具高度興趣，願意學習新技術，提升專業度
• 具備分析市場與競品能力，能制定有效的銷售策略
• 熟悉醫院採購流程或有醫療設備銷售經驗者優先考慮

【加入我們的優勢】
1. 保障底薪 + 獎金制度，努力有回報！
2. 專業培訓與職涯發展，提供完整產品與市場訓練，幫助你成為醫療設備專業顧問！
3. 穩定且高成長的產業，醫療市場需求穩定，未來發展潛力無限！
4. 與專業醫療團隊合作，累積醫療產業人脈，開拓國內醫療市場！

如果您對健康醫學產業充滿熱情，並希望在醫療設備領域發揮影響力，歡迎加入我們，共同推動醫療技術進步，創造更好的健康照護環境！

job_name: 【整形外科事業處】南區業務專員(保障底薪+高額獎金+油資補助)
company_name: 沃醫學股份有限公司
job_description:
市場開發 × 高端醫材銷售

我們正在尋找積極主動、具市場開發能力的業務專員，負責整形外科與外科醫療院所的市場拓展，推廣高端整形醫療設備與耗材，成為醫療專業領域的關鍵業務夥伴！

【工作內容】
1. 市場開發與客戶關係管理：負責外科及整形外科醫療院所的開發與維護，建立長期穩定的合作夥伴關係。
2. 乳房植入物銷售：推廣並銷售高品質乳房植入物，提供醫師專業的技術支援與產品服務。
3. 抽脂設備銷售：負責抽脂設備之市場開發與推廣，提高醫療院所的技術應用與診療品質。
4. 產品簡報與操作示範：獨立進行產品簡報、示範操作與臨床應用指導，確保醫師與醫療團隊能夠熟練操作。
5. 市場競爭分析：分析市場趨勢與競品狀況，研擬行銷策略，提高產品競爭力與市場佔有率。
6. 目標達成：規劃業務策略，與團隊合作，挑戰並達成業務與行銷目標。
7. 中部地區市場拓展：負責中部地區的業務發展，擴大市場影響力，提升產品銷售業績。
8. 其他主管交辦事項：執行主管指派的業務專案，確保團隊目標順利推進。

【我們希望您具備】
• 具備醫療設備、醫美產業、整形外科業務經驗者尤佳
• 熟悉市場開發與銷售流程，能獨立開發客戶資源
• 擅長簡報與溝通談判，能與醫療專業人員建立長期合作關係
• 對醫療產業具高度興趣，願意深入學習產品技術與應用
• 具備市場競爭分析能力，能研擬銷售策略並提高業務成效
• 能接受南部區域外勤工作，自備交通工具佳

【加入我們的優勢】
1. 底薪保障 + 業績獎金，回報值得期待！
2. 專業培訓機制，完整學習乳房植入物與抽脂設備技術應用，讓你成為醫美與整形產業的專業顧問！
3. 穩定且高成長的醫療產業，市場需求穩定，未來發展潛力無限！
4. 與專業醫療團隊合作，累積醫療產業人脈，拓展國內整形市場！

如果您對醫療設備銷售、整形醫美產業充滿熱情，並希望在高端市場中發展業務能力，這將是你展現實力的最佳平台！

立即加入我們，成為整形外科市場的關鍵推動者！

【聖保祿醫院】位於桃園市中心，擁有先進的醫療設備和一流的專業團隊，並以患者為中心、以人為本的服務理念，致力於為每一位患者提供最優質的醫療照護。

job_name: 【中區】門市聽力師(通過試用首年保障年薪86萬)
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
Join Us and Make a Difference at Clinico Group!

We offer comprehensive training in hearing care, nurturing elite professionals in audiology and respiratory therapy. Our goal is to provide meticulous, warm, and professional service to seniors in need of specialized assistance, while also enhancing your own value and challenging yourself with competitive salaries.

We welcome you to join the Colin family if you are someone who:
- Loves Learning: Passionate about acquiring knowledge in medical and instrument expertise.
- Loves Serving: Dedicated to providing patient, attentive, and caring service to elderly clients.
- Loves Working: Enthusiastic about career development and talent cultivation programs.

Come be part of our team and grow with us!

我們擁有完整聽力保健教育訓練，培育聽力和呼吸治療人才菁英，提供專業細心、溫暖的服務，幫助更多需要專業協助的樂齡者同時，提升自我價值，挑戰高年薪！ 

歡迎『樂在學習』(醫療與儀器專業知識)、『樂在服務』(耐心細心愛心服務樂齡族)、『樂在工作』(職涯制度與人才培育計畫)的你/妳加入科林大家庭! 

工作內容： 
1.Consultative Sales:
Operate hospital-grade equipment to assess customer needs and hearing loss levels. Promote hearing aids and other assistive devices to improve their hearing and sleep quality.
2.Customer Relationship Maintenance:
Regularly follow up and care for customers to monitor the usage of their hearing aids and address any issues.
3.Professional Health Education and Consultation:
Educate customers about the impact of hearing and sleep on their daily lives, providing professional advice and support.

1.顧問式銷售
-操作醫院等級儀器了解顧客需求和聽損程度，推廣輔具、改善其聽覺和睡眠品質 
2.維護顧客關係
-定期追蹤和關懷顧客助聽器的使用狀況
3.專業衛教服務與諮詢
-讓顧客了解聽覺與睡眠對與生活的影響性

Certification: Must possess a hearing specialist license issued by a national examination authority.
1.Receive three months of rigorous and professional paid training upon joining, with ongoing mentorship and support from experienced senior colleagues.
2.Enjoy an uncapped commission scheme with opportunities for high earnings upon passing assessments, fostering a win-win situation for both you and the company.

必要條件：具備國家考試核發聽力師執照
1.到職後提供3個月嚴謹並專業的支薪培訓，並配有資深小老師中長期輔導協助 
2.通過考核後，無門檻的高抽成獎金，共創雙贏

raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 【CC】南區業務(藥局&診所通路)-高屏區
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
為什麼我們需要這個職位
我們的業務正在不斷擴展，需要具備卓越銷售技能和市場開發能力的人才來推動業績成長，並確保我們的產品能夠在市場上佔有一席之地。

如何獲得成功
在這個職位中，成功的關鍵在於能夠有效管理客戶關係，達成或超越業績目標，並積極參與市場行銷活動以擴展我們的市場份額。

成長機會
您將有機會接觸並熟悉多樣化的產品線，從保健營養品、美妝保養品到醫療器材。此外，您將在一個充滿支持和協作的團隊中工作，並通過公司提供的豐富資源與培訓計劃，不斷提升自身技能和專業知識。

你將做的事情 
• 管理業績目標：每月/每年目標規劃及業績達成。
• 管理客戶庫存和應收帳款。
• 推動產品銷售，達成業績目標，包括開發新客戶和維護舊客戶關係。
• 配合市場行銷活動，如展會和會議等。
• 主要客戶包括藥妝通路、藥局及診所。
• 銷售產品範圍涵蓋保健營養品、美妝保養品及醫材。


關於這個團隊您應該知道的事情
我們的團隊充滿熱情和活力，致力於推動公司在醫療保健市場的成長。我們提供豐厚的業績獎金，並為業務人員提供配車及車資津貼。我們期待能夠與您一起，為台灣的醫療保健做出貢獻。


About the job
Are you eager to join the largest medical and healthcare group in Taiwan? Do you want to make a meaningful contribution to Taiwan's healthcare industry? If so, welcome to the Clinico, the coolest team in Taiwan!

Why we have this role
Our business is continuously expanding, and we need talented individuals with exceptional sales skills and market development capabilities to drive growth and ensure our products have a strong presence in the market.

How you'll find success
Success in this role hinges on your ability to effectively manage customer relationships, meet or exceed sales targets, and actively participate in marketing activities to expand our market share.

How you grow
You will have the opportunity to work with a diverse product line, from health supplements and beauty care products to medical devices. Additionally, you will work in a supportive and collaborative team environment, with access to ample resources and training programs to continually enhance your skills and expertise.

Things you will do
•  Manage sales targets: Plan and achieve monthly/yearly targets.
•  Manage customer inventory and accounts receivable.
•  Drive product sales to meet targets, including developing new customers and maintaining relationships with existing ones.
•  Participate in marketing activities, such as exhibitions and conferences.
•  Engage with key customers, including drugstore chains, pharmacies, and clinics.
•  Handle a range of products, including health supplements, beauty care products, and medical devices.

• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

15.能提供醫院設備、耗材listing成功相關案例。

job_name: 【南區】門市聽力師(通過試用首年保障年薪86萬)
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
Join Us and Make a Difference at Clinico Group!

We offer comprehensive training in hearing care, nurturing elite professionals in audiology and respiratory therapy. Our goal is to provide meticulous, warm, and professional service to seniors in need of specialized assistance, while also enhancing your own value and challenging yourself with competitive salaries.

We welcome you to join the Colin family if you are someone who:
- Loves Learning: Passionate about acquiring knowledge in medical and instrument expertise.
- Loves Serving: Dedicated to providing patient, attentive, and caring service to elderly clients.
- Loves Working: Enthusiastic about career development and talent cultivation programs.

Come be part of our team and grow with us!

我們擁有完整聽力保健教育訓練，培育聽力和呼吸治療人才菁英，提供專業細心、溫暖的服務，幫助更多需要專業協助的樂齡者同時，提升自我價值，挑戰高年薪！ 

歡迎『樂在學習』(醫療與儀器專業知識)、『樂在服務』(耐心細心愛心服務樂齡族)、『樂在工作』(職涯制度與人才培育計畫)的你/妳加入科林大家庭! 

工作內容： 
1.Consultative Sales:
Operate hospital-grade equipment to assess customer needs and hearing loss levels. Promote hearing aids and other assistive devices to improve their hearing and sleep quality.
2.Customer Relationship Maintenance:
Regularly follow up and care for customers to monitor the usage of their hearing aids and address any issues.
3.Professional Health Education and Consultation:
Educate customers about the impact of hearing and sleep on their daily lives, providing professional advice and support.

1.顧問式銷售
-操作醫院等級儀器了解顧客需求和聽損程度，推廣輔具、改善其聽覺和睡眠品質 
2.維護顧客關係

raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 獸醫業務代表 (Veterinary Sales Representative)
company_name: 美麗康有限公司
job_description:
1. 銷售管理
 • 負責公司外科內視鏡相關設備、器械及耗材的銷售，達成銷售目標。
 • 針對醫療院所（例如醫學中心、地區醫院等）拓展市場，建立穩定的客戶關係。
 • 定期拜訪醫師、手術室人員及醫療採購，提供產品演示、教育和技術支持。
 2. 市場開發
 • 分析市場趨勢、競爭對手資訊，制定並執行有效的銷售策略。
 • 掌握客戶需求，向公司建議新產品的引進及市場策略調整。
 • 與臨床專家、意見領袖（KOL）建立聯繫，參與專業學會活動及醫學研討會以推廣產品。
 3. 產品支援與教育訓練
 • 針對醫療人員進行產品使用及臨床應用的教育訓練。
 • 協助醫療院所內的產品測試、試用及技術問題解決。
 • 提供客戶售後服務及技術支援，解決臨床上遇到的問題。
 4. 團隊合作與管理
 • 協助銷售團隊成員，分享市場資訊和銷售經驗。
 • 與其他內部部門（如產品管理、客戶服務）協調合作，確保產品供應及售後服務順暢。
 5. 報告與分析
 • 定期提交銷售報告，追蹤銷售數據和市場開發進度。

job_name: 【IB】健康顧問-新竹門市(通過考核首年月薪45K，非醫療背景可)
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
About the Job 

"Pursuing Excellence, Upholding Professionalism" is the core value of Hear Better Hearing Center. We are committed to continuously enhancing our expertise and providing personalized services. With passion and professionalism, we support individuals with hearing needs in courageously pursuing their ideal lives and fully enjoying every memorable moment.
Hear Better Hearing Center official website:https://www.ibelive.com.tw

｢追求卓越，堅持專業｣是聽寶助聽中心的核心價值。我們追求不斷精進專業能力，我們堅持提供個人化服務。以熱忱與專業陪伴所有聽力需求者勇敢追求自我理想生活，盡情享受每一個值得紀念的精采時刻。

Why We Have This Role

Hear Better Hearing Center, we pride ourselves on our team of seasoned professionals who provide comprehensive services for all hearing needs. We have pioneered a 5-minute rapid hearing test to help consumers quickly screen for hearing issues. With our advanced equipment, we accurately analyze your hearing condition, eliminating the need for hospital or clinic visits and delivering the most professional hearing care directly to you.

IB助聽中心擁有一群資深的專業服務團隊，能為所有聽力需求者提供完整的服務，首創5分鐘快速聽力測試，幫助消費者快速篩檢聽力問題，並擁有先進的設備，準確地分析您的聽力情況，免去醫院或診所的往返直接給您最專業的聽力服務。

How You'll Find Success 

Successfully increasing customer awareness of hearing and sleep disorders will contribute to improved quality of life for our clients. Your ability to educate and address these concerns effectively will enhance customer satisfaction and trust.

提高顧客對聽覺與睡眠等疾病意識，有更好的生活品質

How You Grow

No prior experience is necessary; we offer a comprehensive 3-month paid training program. This includes classroom instruction as well as ongoing mentorship from experienced professionals. After passing the assessments, you will become a certified hearing specialist with the potential to earn high commission-based bonuses.

無相關背景亦可，提供3個月嚴謹並專業的給薪培訓，課堂之外還配有資深小老師中長期輔導協助，考核通過成為專業選配師!通過考核後享高抽成獎金!

Things You Will Do

1.Deliver Expert Educational Services and Consultations: Provide comprehensive education and guidance to clients on how hearing and sleep health significantly impact their overall quality of life.
2.Conduct Detailed Assessments: Evaluate client needs by performing thorough hearing and respiratory assessments to identify and understand their specific concerns and conditions.
3.Utilize Consultative Sales Techniques: Implement a consultative approach to promote assistive devices, aiming to enhance clients' auditory and sleep quality through tailored solutions.
4.Ensure Ongoing Support and Client Relationship Management: After equipment purchase, offer regular follow-up to monitor usage, address any issues, and maintain strong client relationships through consistent care and support.

1. 專業衛教服務與諮詢，讓顧客了解聽覺與睡眠對與生活的影響性
2. 了解顧客的需求，為顧客進行聽力和呼吸檢測，了解其困擾程度
3. 顧問式銷售方式進行輔具推廣，改善其聽覺、睡眠品質
4. 設備購買後之定期追蹤和關懷使用狀況、維護客情

What We're Looking for on Your Resume

★Passion for Sales and Client Consultation: Enthusiasm for both retail consulting and internal business sales roles.
★Challenging Spirit: Extensive experience in retail sales, a drive for high performance, and the ability to thrive under pressure.
★Service-Oriented Attitude: Friendly, optimistic, and adept at interacting with and listening to clients.
★Proactive and Eager to Learn
★Genuine passion for contributing to the growth of the healthcare sector.
★ A dedication to helping others with a solid professional foundation to meet health needs effectively.

★對門市諮詢、內勤業務銷售具熱忱者
★勇於挑戰：門店銷售業務經驗豐富、樂於追求高績效、具抗壓性
★服務熱忱：親切樂觀、善於與人互動和溝通傾聽
★主動積極、學習力高
★具備投入高成長潛力(醫療保健)產業的熱情
★助人為本，專業紮根以滿足健康需求

What You Should Know About This Team

We are passionate about acquiring and sharing knowledge in medical and equipment fields.
We approach our work with patience, care, and compassion, especially when serving senior clients.
We value a supportive career structure and are committed to talent development.
If you share these values and are eager to contribute, we welcome you to join us at Hear Better Hearing Center!

我們是一群樂在學習(醫療與儀器專業知識)、樂在服務(面對樂齡族耐心細心愛心)、樂在工作(職涯制度與人才培育計畫)的團隊，歡迎這樣的你一起加入聽寶助聽中心!

• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

company_name: 米飛生醫股份有限公司
job_description:
職責：
1.產品銷售：推廣和銷售公司提供的超音波醫療器材，與醫院、診所等醫療機構建立並維持良好的業務關係。
2.市場開發：主動開發潛在客戶，進行市場調研，識別並拓展銷售機會。
3.產品演示與技術支援：為醫療機構進行產品演示，解釋產品技術特點與應用，並提供相關技術支援。
4.業績達成：達成公司設定的銷售目標與業績指標，按時提交銷售報告和市場分析。
5.售後服務與反饋：協助客戶解決產品使用中的問題，收集並向公司反饋客戶意見及市場需求。
6.合作與溝通：與公司內部技術部門、供應商及其他相關方保持密切溝通，確保產品交付與服務品質。

技能與能力要求：
1.工作經驗：至少2年以上醫療器材或電子設備相關行業銷售經驗，有超音波醫療器材銷售經驗者優先。或有超音波臨床經驗2年以上並有意從事業務相關工作者。
2.溝通技巧：具備優秀的溝通與談判能力，能夠有效地向醫療專業人士介紹產品特性和優勢。
3.市場敏感度：熟悉醫療器材行業市場趨勢，具備開發潛在市場和客戶的能力。
4.技術知識：了解超音波醫療設備的基本原理及操作，具備快速學習技術知識的能力。
5.問題解決：能夠主動解決客戶問題，並提供專業的技術和業務支援。
6.時間管理：具備良好的時間管理和自我激勵能力，能夠在壓力下完成銷售目標。

資格條件：
1.學歷：醫學工程、醫療器材、醫學、理工、商業或相關專業大專及以上學歷。
2.語言能力：良好的中文讀寫及口語能力。
3.駕照：需具備有效駕駛執照，能夠根據業務需求進行拜訪和出差。
4.需自備汽車

加分條件：
1.具備超音波醫療器材的專業認證或培訓經驗。
2.擁有醫療行業內部資源或廣泛的業界聯繫。
3.英文及台語溝通能力。

job_name: 【科林】Sales Representative 醫療業務代表 (台中、彰化)
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
<關於職缺>
科林助聽器為業界聽覺輔具的領導品牌，秉持著不斷創新與進步的理念，積極拓展市場
科林榮獲2020國家磐石獎: https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764

<職位提供服務>
提供全方位的視聽保健服務，促進全球華人的耳聰目明
科林微電影: 
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<獲得成就> 
隨著市場需求的增加和業務目標的擴大，推動團隊業績的增長，並且協助培訓和提升團隊的專業技能。這個角色對於實現業務增長和擴展市場具有關鍵作用。

<成長機會>
在這個角色中，你將有機會發展出色的領導和策略制定技能。你的領導能力和策劃能力。你需要有效地帶領團隊達成月度、季度和年度的業績目標，同時提供專業的培訓以提升團隊的業務能力。通過策畫和督導社區活動、醫院合作及其他業務拓展策略，你將能夠顯著提升團隊的績效和公司的市場份額。

<工作內容>
1、醫院及診所客戶關係經營及開發
2、舉辦醫院與診所之服務說明會
3、開發其他相關醫療照護機構
4、協助醫院招標案
【註 】底薪外另有額外業績獎金

<期待特質>
- 強大的領導能力和業務策略制定經驗。
- 優秀的溝通和團隊合作能力，能夠有效地培訓和激勵下屬。
- 具備策劃和實施社區和醫療機構合作活動的經驗。
- 能夠有效地推動業績增長和市場拓展。
- 有醫療相關領域的經驗者優先考慮。

<關於團隊>
我們的團隊是一個充滿活力和合作精神的集體，致力於實現業績目標和業務增長。我們重視每位成員的貢獻，並提供充分的支持和資源來幫助大家達成目標。我們期待那些具有領導力、積極進取並願意接受挑戰的人加入我們的團隊，共同推動業務發展和市場擴展。

<About the Job>
Clinico Group is a leading brand in the hearing aid industry, committed to continuous innovation and progress while actively expanding the market. Clinico Group was honored with the National Rock Award in 2020: 
https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764

<Why We Have This Role>
To provide comprehensive auditory and visual health services, enhancing the hearing and vision of Chinese communities worldwide.
Short films:
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<How You'll Find Success>
With the increasing market demand and the expansion of business objectives, this role is crucial in driving team performance growth and supporting the training and enhancement of the team's professional skills. It plays a key role in achieving business growth and market expansion.

<How You Grow>
In this position, you will have the chance to develop exceptional leadership and strategic planning skills. You will be responsible for effectively leading the team to meet monthly, quarterly, and annual performance targets while providing professional training to enhance the team's business capabilities. Through planning and overseeing community events, hospital collaborations, and other business development strategies, you will significantly boost the team's performance and increase the company's market share.

<Things You Will Do>

1. Build and maintain strong connections with existing and potential hospital and clinic partners.
2. Conduct informative sessions at hospitals and clinics to present services and products.
3. Explore and establish relationships with additional relevant healthcare providers.
4. Support hospitals in their bidding processes for various projects.

**Note**: In addition to a base salary, there are additional performance-based bonuses.

<What We're Looking for on Your Resume>

-Strong Leadership and Strategic Planning Experience
- Excellent Communication and Teamwork Skills
- Experience in Community and Healthcare Collaboration
-Proven Ability to Drive Performance and Market Expansion
-Preference for Healthcare Experience

<What You Should Know About This Team>
Our sales team is vibrant and enthusiastic, embodying the dynamic spirit of Clinico. We are committed to upholding our core values of innovation, integrity, quality, collaboration, and sustainability. Joining us means becoming part of a team that thrives on creativity, teamwork, and a shared commitment to making a positive impact in our industry.

• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
關於職缺
公司致力於大中華眼科事業發展，本著專業化的經營理念，以“設備最全、服務至上”享譽國內眼科界，不斷引進國外先進眼科設備，與全體眼科醫師攜手並進，將全華人眼科推向一流水平的目標而努力。

職位提供服務
這個角色對於公司至關重要，因為它直接關聯到市場的業務拓展和客戶關係管理。我們需要一位專業的業務代表來開發新客戶、維護現有客戶，並確保達成業績目標。通過這個角色，我們希望提升市場佔比，增強品牌影響力，並保持與客戶的長期合作關係。

獲得成就
■積極尋找和接洽新客戶，提供優質的服務以保持現有客戶的滿意度，並確保訂單和帳務的準確處理。
■了解市場需求，掌握行業趨勢，並迅速響應客戶需求，解決問題，從而提升銷售業績和客戶忠誠度。

成長機會
公司將為您提供專業的培訓和發展機會，幫助您提升業務技能和行業知識。隨著您在工作中的表現和業績提升，您將有機會參與更高層次的業務策略規劃，甚至晉升到更高級別的管理職位。

工作內容
■負責寵物市場眼科產品市場開發
■客戶拜訪、分析客戶現況與了解需求，結合公司產品與服務價值，促成銷售商機與合作機會。
■客戶訂單、交貨、教育訓練、服務等日常工作。
■寵物眼科醫療方案及流程規劃。
■年度業績目標達成。

上班地點依照負責區域
北區-新北市中和區中和路366號13樓
中區-台中市北區台灣大道二段340號8樓之2
南區-台南市東區崇德路659之3號2樓

期待條件
■一年以上寵物市場銷售經驗
■具備陌生客戶拜訪能力
■獸醫相關科系畢業者尤佳
■熟悉寵物醫院市場生態


關於團隊
我們的團隊專注於提供高品質的眼科設備和服務解決方案，致力於滿足客戶多樣化的需求。我們重視創新和技術進步，並以客戶滿意度為中心，不斷追求卓越和行業領先地位。


About the Job
The company is committed to the development of the ophthalmology business in the Greater China region. With a professional management philosophy, it has earned a strong reputation in the domestic ophthalmology field for its "comprehensive equipment and top-notch service." The company continuously introduces advanced ophthalmic equipment from abroad and works closely with all ophthalmologists to elevate Chinese-speaking ophthalmology to a world-class level.

Why We Have This Role
This role is crucial to the company as it directly relates to business expansion in the market and customer relationship management. We are looking for a professional sales representative to develop new clients, maintain existing ones, and ensure the achievement of sales targets. Through this role, we aim to increase market share, strengthen brand influence, and maintain long-term partnerships with our clients.

How You'll Find Success
■ Actively seek and engage new clients, provide high-quality service to maintain existing customer satisfaction, and ensure the accurate processing of orders and accounts.
■Understand market demands, keep up with industry trends, and respond quickly to customer needs, resolving issues to improve sales performance and customer loyalty.

How You Grow
The company will provide you with professional training and development opportunities to help enhance your business skills and industry knowledge. As your performance and achievements grow, you will have the opportunity to participate in higher-level business strategy planning and even be promoted to more senior management positions.

Things You Will Do
■Sell ophthalmic instruments and achieve sales targets.
■Develop and maintain relationships with clinics, hospitals, and other clients.
■Handle domestic business dealings, order processing, account management, and client relations.
■Address issues in your area and provide timely solutions to maintain the company’s image.
■Stay updated on market changes and offer solutions and professional advice to clients.

What We're Looking for on Your Resume
■ Over one year of sales experience in the pet market
■ Ability to visit and engage with potential clients
■Preferably a graduate in veterinary-related fields
■Familiarity with the pet hospital market ecosystem

What You Should Know About This Team
Our team provides high-quality ophthalmic equipment and services, focusing on client satisfaction, innovation, and industry leadership.

This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.

job_name: 【全台】門市聽力師(通過試用首年保障年薪86萬)***服務門市依所在區域分配***
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
<關於職缺>
科林助聽器為業界聽覺輔具的領導品牌，秉持著不斷創新與進步的理念，積極拓展市場
科林榮獲2020國家磐石獎: https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764

<職位提供服務>
提供全方位的視聽保健服務，促進全球華人的耳聰目明
科林微電影: 
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<獲得成就> 
提高顧客對聽覺與睡眠等疾病意識，有更好的生活品質

<成長機會>
致力培育聽力和呼吸治療領域菁英，透過多元學習方式強化其職能
具備提供客戶專業衛教諮詢、選配和保健等能力
具備提供客戶客製化的一對一的顧問式服務

<工作內容>
1.提供聽力輔具專業產品，進行衛教、選配和保健建議
2.提供睡眠呼吸正壓器專業產品，進行衛教、銷售服務和保健建議
3.產品銷售及售後追蹤
4.客戶關係管理，舊客與新客的關係維繫
5.相關行政/主管交辦事務

<期待特質>
★對門市諮詢、內勤業務銷售具熱忱者
★勇於挑戰：門店銷售業務經驗豐富、樂於追求高績效、具抗壓性
★服務熱忱：親切樂觀、善於與人互動和溝通傾聽
★主動積極、學習力高
★具備投入高成長潛力(醫療保健)產業的熱情
★助人為本，專業紮根以滿足健康需求

<關於團隊>
提供人才最優渥的薪資，包含業績獎金、年度獎金和年終另計，做越多領越多!
提供人才最充足的資源和舞台，除擁有完整新人知識培育，更舉辦每年專業評鑑，增加職場競爭力



<About the Job>
Clinico Group is a leading brand in the hearing aid industry, committed to continuous innovation and progress while actively expanding the market. Clinico Group was honored with the National Rock Award in 2020: 
https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764


<Why We Have This Role>
To provide comprehensive auditory and visual health services, enhancing the hearing and vision of Chinese communities worldwide.
Short films:
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<How You'll Find Success>
By raising awareness about hearing and sleep disorders, leading to improved quality of life for our customers.

<How You Grow>
We are dedicated to developing elite professionals in the fields of hearing and respiratory therapy, strengthening their skills through diverse learning methods. You'll gain expertise in providing professional health education, selection, and care, as well as customized one-on-one advisory services for clients.

<Things You Will Do>
1. Provide professional hearing aid products, including health education, selection advice, and care recommendations.
2. Provide professional products for sleep apnea therapy, including health education, sales service, and care recommendations.
3. Handle product sales and after-sales follow-up.
4. Manage customer relationships, maintaining connections with both existing and new clients.
5. Perform related administrative tasks and duties assigned by supervisors.

<What We're Looking for on Your Resume>
★ Passionate about in-store consultation and internal sales.
★ Ready for challenges: experienced in store sales, enthusiastic about high performance, and resilient under pressure.
★ Service-oriented: friendly, optimistic, and skilled in interaction and communication.
★ Proactive and eager to learn.
★ Passionate about the high-growth healthcare industry.
★ Dedicated to helping others with a strong professional foundation to meet health needs.

<What You Should Know About This Team>
1. We offer competitive salaries with performance bonuses, annual bonuses, and additional rewards—earn more based on your achievements!
2. We provide ample resources and opportunities, including comprehensive training for newcomers and annual professional evaluations to enhance career competitiveness.

other_benefits_str: 年終獎金、三節獎金/禮品、咖啡吧、結婚禮金、生育津貼、社團補助、員工進修補助、住院慰問金、交通津貼補助、部門聚餐、員工優惠、員工團體保險
raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 國內業務人員(歡迎醫護／照服退休人員二度就業)(承攬性質/非勞動契約)
company_name: 龍巖 長億營業處_五福臻有限公司
job_description:
我們大量廣徵『有工作經驗十年以上、想找趨勢產業、覺得自己值得更好待遇』的人才。

只要您想改變現況、是目標導向、不服輸、想挑戰自己、想在工作中找到生命價值，
誠摯歡迎您，進一步了解我們這個『老年化時代』＆『人生必需品』的事業機會，加入我們龍巖集團-海洋團隊。

很多人無法相信曾經以為的『鐵飯碗(公務員/老師/電子業⋯⋯等)』，在現今的時代也無法給人無後顧之憂的生活品質。

也許您壓根都沒有想過轉換不同的職域
這點我們許多金融業／不動產業／科技業的主管曾經也和您一樣
機會是留給願意接受新事物的您。

當您努力到現在，發現未來前途忽明忽暗，
景氣時好時壞，但每月帳單都得按時繳納，
您如何打算？
這裡不會太輕鬆但卻可以很有成就，有自己的舞台，
這裡你的努力會反映在你的薪水上，讓你的夢想成真，
這裡沒有工作年限與裁員的問題，不用擔心產業結構改變，
這裡有完整的教育訓練，讓你不會像無頭蒼蠅不知所措，
這絕對是一個機會，但你渴望成功、渴望讓自己更好嗎? 
其實只要順著趨勢走成功是有方法的

給自己一個『了解看看看』、『試試看』的機會吧！

一場傳染病風暴，就讓各產業均受到嚴重衝擊，但龍巖今年逆勢成長！
事實上，危機就是轉機，每當逆境產生，就會誕生一批新興產業！
只要能夠強先在市場卡位，就能把握先機，再創高峰！

job_name: 【科林】睡眠產品行政專員
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
About the Job

You will provide home sleep monitoring services, assist in interpreting reports, and offer education for complex cases. Your role involves promoting awareness of sleep apnea, increasing public understanding of the condition, and helping individuals improve their sleep quality.

提供居家睡眠檢測服務、協助判讀報告，並針對複雜個案進行衛教。你將推廣睡眠呼吸中止症的嚴重性，提高大眾對該病的認識，幫助民眾改善睡眠品質。

Why We Have This Role

We aim to enhance the professional standards of sleep monitoring and respiratory therapy, and to raise public awareness and understanding of sleep apnea. With growing demand for sleep health services, we need specialists to advocate for this crucial knowledge and deliver high-quality care.

提高睡眠檢測和呼吸治療的專業水平，增進社會大眾對睡眠呼吸中止症的認識和病識感。隨著對睡眠健康需求的增加，我們需要專業人士來推廣相關知識，提供高品質的服務。

How You'll Find Success

Success in this role will be defined by your ability to effectively guide retail staff, accurately interpret sleep study reports, and successfully promote sleep-related products and services. Your efforts will contribute to improving public sleep quality and increasing societal emphasis on sleep health.

能夠有效地指導門市人員，提供準確的睡眠檢測報告解讀，並成功推廣睡眠相關產品及服務。你的工作將幫助提升民眾的睡眠質量，並增強社會對睡眠健康的重視。

How You Grow

In this position, you will have the opportunity to advance your expertise and skills, gaining experience in the field of sleep medicine. You will participate in professional training, conferences, and industry events, expanding your professional network and industry influence.

在這個職位中，你將有機會提升你的專業知識和技能，拓展在睡眠醫學領域的經驗。你將參與專業培訓、學會活動以及展會，進一步擴展你的專業網絡和行業影響力。

Things You Will Do

1. Online HST shipment, receiving, and customer service editing
2. Assist in troubleshooting online customer issues
3. Operation tracking
4. HST report analysis
5. Inventory management of equipment
6. Adding and modifying customer list system
7. Support operations for the Sleep Medicine Business Unit


1.線上HST出貨、收貨、線上服務小編
2.協助線上客戶問題排除
3.追蹤作業
4.HST報告分析
5.庫存機之盤點管理
6.客戶名單系統之新增與修改
7.支援睡眠醫學事業處作業



What We're Looking For on Your Resume

1.A background in healthcare or medical-related fields, with knowledge of sleep health, is preferred.
2.Strong communication skills and a collaborative team spirit.

1.醫療或健康相關背景，熟悉睡眠健康知識者佳。
2.良好的溝通能力及團隊合作精神。

What You Should Know About This Team

Our team is dedicated to advancing sleep health and respiratory therapy services, with a focus on increasing awareness of sleep apnea. We value the enhancement of professional knowledge and team collaboration. We expect every member to continuously learn and grow within their field of expertise.

我們的團隊專注於提升睡眠健康和呼吸治療的專業服務，致力於推廣睡眠呼吸中止症的認識。我們重視專業知識的提升和團隊合作，並期望每位成員能夠在專業領域中持續學習和成長。

raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 【整形外科事業處】中區業務專員(保障底薪+高額獎金+油資補助)
company_name: 沃醫學股份有限公司
job_description:
市場開發 × 高端醫材銷售

我們正在尋找積極主動、具市場開發能力的業務專員，負責整形外科與外科醫療院所的市場拓展，推廣高端整形醫療設備與耗材，成為醫療專業領域的關鍵業務夥伴！

【工作內容】
1. 市場開發與客戶關係管理：負責外科及整形外科醫療院所的開發與維護，建立長期穩定的合作夥伴關係。
2. 乳房植入物銷售：推廣並銷售高品質乳房植入物，提供醫師專業的技術支援與產品服務。
3. 抽脂設備銷售：負責抽脂設備之市場開發與推廣，提高醫療院所的技術應用與診療品質。
4. 產品簡報與操作示範：獨立進行產品簡報、示範操作與臨床應用指導，確保醫師與醫療團隊能夠熟練操作。
5. 市場競爭分析：分析市場趨勢與競品狀況，研擬行銷策略，提高產品競爭力與市場佔有率。
6. 目標達成：規劃業務策略，與團隊合作，挑戰並達成業務與行銷目標。
7. 中部地區市場拓展：負責中部地區的業務發展，擴大市場影響力，提升產品銷售業績。
8. 其他主管交辦事項：執行主管指派的業務專案，確保團隊目標順利推進。

【我們希望您具備】
• 具備醫療設備、醫美產業、整形外科業務經驗者尤佳
• 熟悉市場開發與銷售流程，能獨立開發客戶資源
• 擅長簡報與溝通談判，能與醫療專業人員建立長期合作關係
• 對醫療產業具高度興趣，願意深入學習產品技術與應用
• 具備市場競爭分析能力，能研擬銷售策略並提高業務成效
• 能接受中部區域外勤工作，自備交通工具佳

【加入我們的優勢】
1. 底薪保障 + 業績獎金，回報值得期待！
2. 專業培訓機制，完整學習乳房植入物與抽脂設備技術應用，讓你成為醫美與整形產業的專業顧問！
3. 穩定且高成長的醫療產業，市場需求穩定，未來發展潛力無限！
4. 與專業醫療團隊合作，累積醫療產業人脈，拓展國內整形市場！

如果您對醫療設備銷售、整形醫美產業充滿熱情，並希望在高端市場中發展業務能力，這將是你展現實力的最佳平台！

立即加入我們，成為整形外科市場的關鍵推動者！

job_name: 【IB】健康顧問-土城門市(通過考核首年月薪45K，非醫療背景可)
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
About the Job 

"Pursuing Excellence, Upholding Professionalism" is the core value of Hear Better Hearing Center. We are committed to continuously enhancing our expertise and providing personalized services. With passion and professionalism, we support individuals with hearing needs in courageously pursuing their ideal lives and fully enjoying every memorable moment.
Hear Better Hearing Center official website:https://www.ibelive.com.tw

｢追求卓越，堅持專業｣是聽寶助聽中心的核心價值。我們追求不斷精進專業能力，我們堅持提供個人化服務。以熱忱與專業陪伴所有聽力需求者勇敢追求自我理想生活，盡情享受每一個值得紀念的精采時刻。

Why We Have This Role

Hear Better Hearing Center, we pride ourselves on our team of seasoned professionals who provide comprehensive services for all hearing needs. We have pioneered a 5-minute rapid hearing test to help consumers quickly screen for hearing issues. With our advanced equipment, we accurately analyze your hearing condition, eliminating the need for hospital or clinic visits and delivering the most professional hearing care directly to you.

IB助聽中心擁有一群資深的專業服務團隊，能為所有聽力需求者提供完整的服務，首創5分鐘快速聽力測試，幫助消費者快速篩檢聽力問題，並擁有先進的設備，準確地分析您的聽力情況，免去醫院或診所的往返直接給您最專業的聽力服務。

How You'll Find Success 

Successfully increasing customer awareness of hearing and sleep disorders will contribute to improved quality of life for our clients. Your ability to educate and address these concerns effectively will enhance customer satisfaction and trust.

提高顧客對聽覺與睡眠等疾病意識，有更好的生活品質

How You Grow

No prior experience is necessary; we offer a comprehensive 3-month paid training program. This includes classroom instruction as well as ongoing mentorship from experienced professionals. After passing the assessments, you will become a certified hearing specialist with the potential to earn high commission-based bonuses.

無相關背景亦可，提供3個月嚴謹並專業的給薪培訓，課堂之外還配有資深小老師中長期輔導協助，考核通過成為專業選配師!通過考核後享高抽成獎金!

Things You Will Do

1.Deliver Expert Educational Services and Consultations: Provide comprehensive education and guidance to clients on how hearing and sleep health significantly impact their overall quality of life.
2.Conduct Detailed Assessments: Evaluate client needs by performing thorough hearing and respiratory assessments to identify and understand their specific concerns and conditions.
3.Utilize Consultative Sales Techniques: Implement a consultative approach to promote assistive devices, aiming to enhance clients' auditory and sleep quality through tailored solutions.
4.Ensure Ongoing Support and Client Relationship Management: After equipment purchase, offer regular follow-up to monitor usage, address any issues, and maintain strong client relationships through consistent care and support.

1. 專業衛教服務與諮詢，讓顧客了解聽覺與睡眠對與生活的影響性
2. 了解顧客的需求，為顧客進行聽力和呼吸檢測，了解其困擾程度
3. 顧問式銷售方式進行輔具推廣，改善其聽覺、睡眠品質
4. 設備購買後之定期追蹤和關懷使用狀況、維護客情

What We're Looking for on Your Resume

★Passion for Sales and Client Consultation: Enthusiasm for both retail consulting and internal business sales roles.
★Challenging Spirit: Extensive experience in retail sales, a drive for high performance, and the ability to thrive under pressure.
★Service-Oriented Attitude: Friendly, optimistic, and adept at interacting with and listening to clients.
★Proactive and Eager to Learn
★Genuine passion for contributing to the growth of the healthcare sector.
★ A dedication to helping others with a solid professional foundation to meet health needs effectively.

★對門市諮詢、內勤業務銷售具熱忱者
★勇於挑戰：門店銷售業務經驗豐富、樂於追求高績效、具抗壓性
★服務熱忱：親切樂觀、善於與人互動和溝通傾聽
★主動積極、學習力高
★具備投入高成長潛力(醫療保健)產業的熱情
★助人為本，專業紮根以滿足健康需求

What You Should Know About This Team

We are passionate about acquiring and sharing knowledge in medical and equipment fields.
We approach our work with patience, care, and compassion, especially when serving senior clients.
We value a supportive career structure and are committed to talent development.
If you share these values and are eager to contribute, we welcome you to join us at Hear Better Hearing Center!

我們是一群樂在學習(醫療與儀器專業知識)、樂在服務(面對樂齡族耐心細心愛心)、樂在工作(職涯制度與人才培育計畫)的團隊，歡迎這樣的你一起加入聽寶助聽中心!

job_name: 醫療銷售業務代表 / 醫療銷售業務助理
company_name: 嘉文國際事業有限公司
job_description:
本司代理醫療用相關產品及設備。 
主要銷售客戶為各大醫院泌尿科及婦產科/耳鼻喉科 ，
因公司業務規模擴大，目前針對『業務代表』及『業務助理』進行人才招募。
在醫療等相關之專業領域上，我們與各大醫學中心、地區型醫院等醫療院所皆有長期配合，與客戶之間相互信賴。同時，也陸續引進國外優質醫療用相關產品及設備，公司積極擴展及橫跨科別領域。我們重視每一位員工，不僅有良好的工作環境，也提供學習及成長空間，歡迎優秀肯用心，努力學習的您一起加入。  


【工作內容】 
1.拜訪固定或非固定之醫院/診所，銷售及推廣手術醫療用儀器設備及醫材。  
2.協助客戶了解公司產品使用。 
3.公司提供完整教育訓練。
4.完成主管交辦事項。 
5.開發或維護客戶關係。
6.教育及示範產品使用方式 。
7.處理客戶所提出產品相關應用的技術問題，並提供客戶技術支援服務。
8.行政事務處理、報表彙整與管理、文件檔案資料處理、轉換及整合工作。 
9.協助準備醫院標案、合約、報價、進院、機器採購等行政文書流程，含文件資料整理、用印、建檔。
10.主要負責範圍為台南、高雄、屏東等地區。


【我們希望擁有的特質】 
1.對醫療產業有興趣。
2.無經驗可，公司提供完整產品教育訓練，只要您有樂意學習的心。 
3.思考邏輯清晰、溝通表達能力佳。 
4.不怕犯錯勇於發問，懂得修正並獨立解決問題。
5.歡迎所有求職者與原住民及新住民。
 

 【加分條件】 
 * 有護理背景。 
 * 曾有醫療產業相關經驗。


【法定項目】 
週休二日/勞保/健保/陪產假/產假/產檢假/女性生理假。


【其他福利】 
年終獎金/三節禮品禮金或獎金/辦公室零食櫃/結婚禮金/提供國內外旅遊補助/部門聚餐/勞基法特休/員工團體保險/生日禮券/生日慶生聚餐。

上述福利制度，其相關規範依公司為主。

raw_benefits:
本集團致力打造一個能讓員工無後顧之憂的工作環境，努力健全各項制度，提供豐富完善的福利措施，使每位員工及其家庭都能享受舒適愉悅的生活，感受公司給予的關懷與用心。

1.考勤制度：
1)內勤人員上下班前後彈性30分鐘工時-有8:00/8:30/9:00三種班別可選擇(擇一，固定式)。
2)全集團同仁優於給予，午休時間由一小時多延長30分鐘，下班時間不變。

2.薪資制度：
1)年終獎金-依「員工績效考核辦法」評核，於年度終了視集團整體營運狀況予以發放年終獎金。
2)年度盈餘員工酬勞-經股東會承認盈餘分派表分後分配予本集團員工，配發標準依「員工酬勞辦法」辦理。
3)員工入股、現金增資認股、發行員工認股權憑證-視整體營運所需辦理並制定相關辦法以利員工遵循之。
4)員工持股信託-依員工持股信託管理辦法辦理。

3.完善貼心的福利制度：
1)完善保險計劃-到職當日除依法為每位同仁投保勞工保險、全民健康保險外，亦加入完整的團體綜合保險，保障範圍包括壽險、意外險、醫療險、癌症險、防疫險..等。
2)三節禮金。
3)健康檢查-全額補助新進員工健康檢查外，滿一年以上之員工享有每兩年一次集團舉辦之健康檢查。
4)提供員工出差或受訓免費住宿。
5)職工福利委員會各項補助支出-
(1)喪葬補助
(2)醫療補助
(3)結婚補助
(4)國內/國外旅遊補助
(5)生日/三節禮金
(6)生育補助
(7)進修補助
(8)年終尾牙
(9)不定期舉辦活動-如中秋烤肉。
4.學習與發展：
1)教育訓練-
(1)職前訓練
(2)企業內/外部訓練
(3)國外研修訓練
2)各類專業證照獎勵申請與核發-
依據內部辦法給予專業證照獎勵及補助該證照報名費用。

job_name: 【科林】Sales Representative 醫療業務代表 (北區)
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
<關於職缺>
科林助聽器為業界聽覺輔具的領導品牌，秉持著不斷創新與進步的理念，積極拓展市場
科林榮獲2020國家磐石獎: https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764

<職位提供服務>
提供全方位的視聽保健服務，促進全球華人的耳聰目明
科林微電影: 
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<獲得成就> 
隨著市場需求的增加和業務目標的擴大，推動團隊業績的增長，並且協助培訓和提升團隊的專業技能。這個角色對於實現業務增長和擴展市場具有關鍵作用。

<成長機會>
在這個角色中，你將有機會發展出色的領導和策略制定技能。你的領導能力和策劃能力。你需要有效地帶領團隊達成月度、季度和年度的業績目標，同時提供專業的培訓以提升團隊的業務能力。通過策畫和督導社區活動、醫院合作及其他業務拓展策略，你將能夠顯著提升團隊的績效和公司的市場份額。

<工作內容>
1、醫院及診所客戶關係經營及開發
2、舉辦醫院與診所之服務說明會
3、開發其他相關醫療照護機構
4、協助醫院招標案
【註 】底薪外另有額外業績獎金

<期待特質>
- 強大的領導能力和業務策略制定經驗。
- 優秀的溝通和團隊合作能力，能夠有效地培訓和激勵下屬。
- 具備策劃和實施社區和醫療機構合作活動的經驗。
- 能夠有效地推動業績增長和市場拓展。
- 有醫療相關領域的經驗者優先考慮。

<關於團隊>
我們的團隊是一個充滿活力和合作精神的集體，致力於實現業績目標和業務增長。我們重視每位成員的貢獻，並提供充分的支持和資源來幫助大家達成目標。我們期待那些具有領導力、積極進取並願意接受挑戰的人加入我們的團隊，共同推動業務發展和市場擴展。

<About the Job>
Clinico Group is a leading brand in the hearing aid industry, committed to continuous innovation and progress while actively expanding the market. Clinico Group was honored with the National Rock Award in 2020: 
https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764

<Why We Have This Role>
To provide comprehensive auditory and visual health services, enhancing the hearing and vision of Chinese communities worldwide.
Short films:
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<How You'll Find Success>
With the increasing market demand and the expansion of business objectives, this role is crucial in driving team performance growth and supporting the training and enhancement of the team's professional skills. It plays a key role in achieving business growth and market expansion.

<How You Grow>
In this position, you will have the chance to develop exceptional leadership and strategic planning skills. You will be responsible for effectively leading the team to meet monthly, quarterly, and annual performance targets while providing professional training to enhance the team's business capabilities. Through planning and overseeing community events, hospital collaborations, and other business development strategies, you will significantly boost the team's performance and increase the company's market share.

<Things You Will Do>

1. Build and maintain strong connections with existing and potential hospital and clinic partners.
2. Conduct informative sessions at hospitals and clinics to present services and products.
3. Explore and establish relationships with additional relevant healthcare providers.
4. Support hospitals in their bidding processes for various projects.

**Note**: In addition to a base salary, there are additional performance-based bonuses.

<What We're Looking for on Your Resume>

-Strong Leadership and Strategic Planning Experience
- Excellent Communication and Teamwork Skills
- Experience in Community and Healthcare Collaboration
-Proven Ability to Drive Performance and Market Expansion
-Preference for Healthcare Experience

<What You Should Know About This Team>
Our sales team is vibrant and enthusiastic, embodying the dynamic spirit of Clinico. We are committed to upholding our core values of innovation, integrity, quality, collaboration, and sustainability. Joining us means becoming part of a team that thrives on creativity, teamwork, and a shared commitment to making a positive impact in our industry.

raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 【整形外科事業處】南區產品專員(擴編)
company_name: 沃醫學股份有限公司
job_description:
結合外科醫學與市場，打造精準產品行銷策略！

我們正在尋找對整形外科與醫療產品行銷有興趣的產品專員，負責整形相關耗材、醫療儀器的市場規劃、銷售與教育訓練，並與醫師密切合作，確保產品能有效應用於臨床實務。

【工作內容】
1. 產品銷售規劃與行銷策略：負責整形外科相關產品（如義乳植入物、耗材、超音波儀器等）的市場行銷規劃，並評估行銷效益，制定最適銷售策略。
2. 醫學專業與市場整合：參與整形手術觀摩，學習醫學專業知識，並協助產品行銷整合，以提升市場競爭力。
3. 醫學文獻研究與資訊整合：具備良好的英文能力與專業背景，能閱讀醫學文獻，並有效整理與轉化醫療專業資訊。
4. 醫師需求分析與問題解決：協助業務代表深入了解醫師需求，提供產品支援並解決臨床問題。
5. 內外部產品教育訓練：負責公司內部團隊與客戶端的產品教育，確保醫療人員與銷售團隊具備完整產品知識。
6. 臨床支援：協助醫療團隊進行臨床相關工作，確保產品在醫療現場的應用符合標準並發揮最佳效能。
7. 跨部門協作：協助執行公司內部相關專案與部門任務，確保產品管理與市場行銷策略順利推動。
8. 學習與成長：無經驗可，但需具備高度學習企圖心，並具良好簡報與溝通能力，能有效向內外部團隊傳遞專業資訊。

【我們希望您具備】
• 醫學、美容醫學、生物科技、醫療器材、護理或相關科系背景者尤佳
• 具醫療產品行銷、醫療器材銷售經驗者優先，但無經驗可培訓
• 熟悉醫學文獻閱讀與資訊整合，可將專業知識應用於市場策略與教育訓練
• 良好的溝通能力與簡報技巧，能有效與醫師、業務團隊及行銷部門合作
• 積極學習，願意投入醫療產業發展，並勇於接受挑戰

【福利與發展機會】

1. 深入參與整形外科市場，學習最新醫學技術與產品應用
2. 提供完整醫學知識與行銷技能培訓，快速累積專業經驗
3. 與國際知名大廠合作，拓展專業視野與人脈
4. 穩定發展機會，晉升管道順暢

如果您對於整形外科產品、市場行銷與醫療產業有高度興趣，並希望發展醫學專業與產品管理技能，歡迎加入我們，成為整外業界專業的產品專員！

job_name: 中南區-獸醫業務代表 (Veterinary Sales Representative)
company_name: 美麗康有限公司
job_description:
1. 銷售管理
 • 負責公司外科內視鏡相關設備、器械及耗材的銷售，達成銷售目標。
 • 針對醫療院所（例如醫學中心、地區醫院等）拓展市場，建立穩定的客戶關係。
 • 定期拜訪醫師、手術室人員及醫療採購，提供產品演示、教育和技術支持。
 2. 市場開發
 • 分析市場趨勢、競爭對手資訊，制定並執行有效的銷售策略。
 • 掌握客戶需求，向公司建議新產品的引進及市場策略調整。
 • 與臨床專家、意見領袖（KOL）建立聯繫，參與專業學會活動及醫學研討會以推廣產品。
 3. 產品支援與教育訓練
 • 針對醫療人員進行產品使用及臨床應用的教育訓練。
 • 協助醫療院所內的產品測試、試用及技術問題解決。
 • 提供客戶售後服務及技術支援，解決臨床上遇到的問題。
 4. 團隊合作與管理
 • 協助銷售團隊成員，分享市場資訊和銷售經驗。
 • 與其他內部部門（如產品管理、客戶服務）協調合作，確保產品供應及售後服務順暢。
 5. 報告與分析
 • 定期提交銷售報告，追蹤銷售數據和市場開發進度。
 • 對市場變化和銷售表現進行分析，並建議改善措施。
