job_name: 【眼科儀器】(南區)維修工程師
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
About the Job

Our company is committed to advancing the field of ophthalmology in Greater China. We uphold a professional approach with a focus on "comprehensive equipment and superior service," earning a distinguished reputation within the domestic ophthalmology community. We continually introduce advanced international ophthalmic technologies and collaborate with ophthalmologists to elevate the standards of ophthalmology for the entire Chinese-speaking community.

公司致力於大中華眼科事業發展，本著專業化的經營理念，以“設備最全、服務至上”享譽國內眼科界，不斷引進國外先進眼科設備，與全體眼科醫師攜手並進，將全華人眼科推向一流水平的目標而努力。

Why We Have This Role

We prioritize customer satisfaction and product reliability. To ensure our ophthalmic equipment remains efficient and meets client needs, we require a skilled maintenance engineer to uphold our service quality and build customer trust.

我們重視客戶的滿意度和產品的可靠性，為了確保眼科設備能夠保持高效運行並滿足客戶需求，我們需要專業的維修工程師共同為公司的服務品質和客戶信任努力。

How You'll Find Success 

■Exceptional technical skills
■Outstanding customer service

■卓越的技術能力
■優秀的客戶服務能力

How You Grow

We value the professional development and personal growth of our employees. As a maintenance engineer, you will have opportunities to participate in the company’s technical training and learning programs, continuously enhancing your skills and knowledge.

我們重視員工的專業發展和個人成長。作為維修工程師，您將有機會參與公司的技術培訓和學習計劃，不斷提升您的技能和知識水平。

Things You Will Do

■Technical Work: Responsible for the installation, maintenance, testing, and repair of ophthalmic instruments and related products.
■Business Goals: Support the achievement of business department objectives by providing professional technical services.
■Service Indicators: Maintain repair work orders and technical documents to ensure service indicators and annual repair goals are met.
■Customer Satisfaction: Ensure customer satisfaction by providing timely updates on machine status and repair progress, maintaining good interaction with customers.
■Support Department: Assist with tasks assigned by the department manager, including supporting product tours and related activities.
■Responsible Area: From Chiayi South to Taitung.

■技術工作 : 負責眼科儀器等相關產品的安裝, 保養, 檢測及維修
■業務目標 : 透過提供專業技術服務, 以支援業務部門目標的達成
■服務指標 : 維修工單與技術文件維護, 確保服務指標與維修年度目標達成
■客戶滿意 : 確保客戶服務之滿意度, 即時提供機器狀況及維修進度, 與客戶保持良好之互動
■支援部門 : 部門主管委託交辦之業務, 支援產品巡迴等活動
■負責區域: 嘉義以南至台東

What We're Looking for on Your Resume

■Bachelor's degree or higher, with relevant repair experience.
■Proficient in customer service and after-sales follow-up.
■Strong teamwork and communication skills.

■大學以上畢業，具備維修經驗
■擅長顧客服務、售後追蹤
■具備良好的團體合作及溝通能力

What You Should Know About This Team

Our team is dedicated to delivering high-quality ophthalmic equipment and service solutions, with a focus on meeting diverse client needs. We prioritize innovation and technological advancement, continuously striving for excellence and a leading position in the industry, all while keeping customer satisfaction at the core of our efforts.

我們的團隊專注於提供高品質的眼科設備和服務解決方案，致力於滿足客戶多樣化的需求。我們重視創新和技術進步，並以客戶滿意度為中心，不斷追求卓越和行業領先地位。

legal_benefits_str: 勞保、健保、特別休假
other_benefits_str: 年終獎金、三節獎金/禮品、咖啡吧、結婚禮金、生育津貼、社團補助、員工進修補助、住院慰問金、交通津貼補助、部門聚餐、員工優惠、員工團體保險
raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
<關於職缺>
科林助聽器為業界聽覺輔具的領導品牌，秉持著不斷創新與進步的理念，積極拓展市場
科林榮獲2020國家磐石獎: https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764

<職位提供服務>
提供全方位的視聽保健服務，促進全球華人的耳聰目明
科林微電影: 
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<獲得成就> 
隨著市場需求的增加和業務目標的擴大，推動團隊業績的增長，並且協助培訓和提升團隊的專業技能。這個角色對於實現業務增長和擴展市場具有關鍵作用。

<成長機會>
在這個角色中，你將有機會發展出色的領導和策略制定技能。你的領導能力和策劃能力。你需要有效地帶領團隊達成月度、季度和年度的業績目標，同時提供專業的培訓以提升團隊的業務能力。通過策畫和督導社區活動、醫院合作及其他業務拓展策略，你將能夠顯著提升團隊的績效和公司的市場份額。

<工作內容>
1、醫院及診所客戶關係經營及開發
2、舉辦醫院與診所之服務說明會
3、開發其他相關醫療照護機構
4、協助醫院招標案
【註 】底薪外另有額外業績獎金

<期待特質>
- 強大的領導能力和業務策略制定經驗。
- 優秀的溝通和團隊合作能力，能夠有效地培訓和激勵下屬。
- 具備策劃和實施社區和醫療機構合作活動的經驗。
- 能夠有效地推動業績增長和市場拓展。
- 有醫療相關領域的經驗者優先考慮。

<關於團隊>
我們的團隊是一個充滿活力和合作精神的集體，致力於實現業績目標和業務增長。我們重視每位成員的貢獻，並提供充分的支持和資源來幫助大家達成目標。我們期待那些具有領導力、積極進取並願意接受挑戰的人加入我們的團隊，共同推動業務發展和市場擴展。

<About the Job>
Clinico Group is a leading brand in the hearing aid industry, committed to continuous innovation and progress while actively expanding the market. Clinico Group was honored with the National Rock Award in 2020: 
https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764

<Why We Have This Role>
To provide comprehensive auditory and visual health services, enhancing the hearing and vision of Chinese communities worldwide.
Short films:
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<How You'll Find Success>
With the increasing market demand and the expansion of business objectives, this role is crucial in driving team performance growth and supporting the training and enhancement of the team's professional skills. It plays a key role in achieving business growth and market expansion.

<How You Grow>
In this position, you will have the chance to develop exceptional leadership and strategic planning skills. You will be responsible for effectively leading the team to meet monthly, quarterly, and annual performance targets while providing professional training to enhance the team's business capabilities. Through planning and overseeing community events, hospital collaborations, and other business development strategies, you will significantly boost the team's performance and increase the company's market share.

<Things You Will Do>

1. Build and maintain strong connections with existing and potential hospital and clinic partners.
2. Conduct informative sessions at hospitals and clinics to present services and products.
3. Explore and establish relationships with additional relevant healthcare providers.
4. Support hospitals in their bidding processes for various projects.

**Note**: In addition to a base salary, there are additional performance-based bonuses.

<What We're Looking for on Your Resume>

-Strong Leadership and Strategic Planning Experience
- Excellent Communication and Teamwork Skills
- Experience in Community and Healthcare Collaboration
-Proven Ability to Drive Performance and Market Expansion
-Preference for Healthcare Experience

<What You Should Know About This Team>
Our sales team is vibrant and enthusiastic, embodying the dynamic spirit of Clinico. We are committed to upholding our core values of innovation, integrity, quality, collaboration, and sustainability. Joining us means becoming part of a team that thrives on creativity, teamwork, and a shared commitment to making a positive impact in our industry.

• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 【科林】睡眠技師(日班/雙北為主)
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
About the Job

You will provide home sleep monitoring services, assist in interpreting reports, and offer education for complex cases. Your role involves promoting awareness of sleep apnea, increasing public understanding of the condition, and helping individuals improve their sleep quality.

提供居家睡眠檢測服務、協助判讀報告，並針對複雜個案進行衛教。你將推廣睡眠呼吸中止症的嚴重性，提高大眾對該病的認識，幫助民眾改善睡眠品質。

Why We Have This Role

We aim to enhance the professional standards of sleep monitoring and respiratory therapy, and to raise public awareness and understanding of sleep apnea. With growing demand for sleep health services, we need specialists to advocate for this crucial knowledge and deliver high-quality care.

提高睡眠檢測和呼吸治療的專業水平，增進社會大眾對睡眠呼吸中止症的認識和病識感。隨著對睡眠健康需求的增加，我們需要專業人士來推廣相關知識，提供高品質的服務。

How You'll Find Success

Success in this role will be defined by your ability to effectively guide retail staff, accurately interpret sleep study reports, and successfully promote sleep-related products and services. Your efforts will contribute to improving public sleep quality and increasing societal emphasis on sleep health.

能夠有效地指導門市人員，提供準確的睡眠檢測報告解讀，並成功推廣睡眠相關產品及服務。你的工作將幫助提升民眾的睡眠質量，並增強社會對睡眠健康的重視。

How You Grow

In this position, you will have the opportunity to advance your expertise and skills, gaining experience in the field of sleep medicine. You will participate in professional training, conferences, and industry events, expanding your professional network and industry influence.

在這個職位中，你將有機會提升你的專業知識和技能，拓展在睡眠醫學領域的經驗。你將參與專業培訓、學會活動以及展會，進一步擴展你的專業網絡和行業影響力。

Things You Will Do

1.Conduct Sleep Studies and Report Interpretation: Perform sleep-related tests and analyze reports.
2.Product Introduction and Education: Present and promote sleep-related products, providing education to customers.
3.Staff Training: Train retail staff on the use of respiratory devices, offering operational guidance and education.
4.Industry Engagement: Participate in conferences, exhibitions, and other events to promote products and services.
5.Hospital Support: Assist with on-site services at hospitals.
Work Location and Areas

Primary Work Location: Twin Cities (New Taipei City and Taipei City) at the Clinico Hearing aid stores, with flexibility based on your residence.
Main Service Area: Twin Cities, with occasional support in Taoyuan, Hsinchu, and Miaoli.

1.執行睡眠相關檢查與報告判讀。
2.介紹、衛教及推廣睡眠相關產品。
3.培訓門市人員使用呼吸器，提供操作指導和衛教。
4.參與學會、展會等活動，推廣產品和服務。
5.協助醫院提供駐點服務。

平日工作地點為雙北科林助聽門市，但可根據居住地調整。主要負責區域為雙北，不定期支援桃竹苗。

What We're Looking For on Your Resume

We are seeking candidates with certification as a sleep technician or respiratory therapist and clinical experience in sleep medicine. The ideal candidate should have:

Expertise in Sleep Studies: Professional knowledge in conducting sleep tests and interpreting reports.
Product Promotion Skills: Ability to effectively promote sleep-related products and services.

我們尋找具備睡眠技師或呼吸治療師證書的人選，且擁有睡眠臨床經驗。理想的候選人應具備睡眠檢測和報告判讀的專業知識，並能夠有效推廣相關產品及服務。

What You Should Know About This Team

Our team is dedicated to advancing sleep health and respiratory therapy services, with a focus on increasing awareness of sleep apnea. We value the enhancement of professional knowledge and team collaboration. We expect every member to continuously learn and grow within their field of expertise.

我們的團隊專注於提升睡眠健康和呼吸治療的專業服務，致力於推廣睡眠呼吸中止症的認識。我們重視專業知識的提升和團隊合作，並期望每位成員能夠在專業領域中持續學習和成長。

job_name: 【耳科】業務開發主管 (中區)
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
<關於職缺>
科林助聽器為業界聽覺輔具的領導品牌，秉持著不斷創新與進步的理念，積極拓展市場
科林榮獲2020國家磐石獎: https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764

<職位提供服務>
提供全方位的視聽保健服務，促進全球華人的耳聰目明
科林微電影: 
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<獲得成就> 
隨著市場需求的增加和業務目標的擴大，推動團隊業績的增長，並且協助培訓和提升團隊的專業技能。這個角色對於實現業務增長和擴展市場具有關鍵作用。

<成長機會>
在這個角色中，你將有機會發展出色的領導和策略制定技能。你的領導能力和策劃能力。你需要有效地帶領團隊達成月度、季度和年度的業績目標，同時提供專業的培訓以提升團隊的業務能力。通過策畫和督導社區活動、醫院合作及其他業務拓展策略，你將能夠顯著提升團隊的績效和公司的市場份額。

<工作內容>
- 達成團隊的月度、季度和年度業績目標。
- 負責下轄業務人員的培訓和技能提升。
- 策劃和督導團隊成員完成以下工作：
  1. 舉辦社區聽力活動，提升科林門市在社區中的認同感，增加進店數量和成交率。
  2. 組織醫院和診所的產品說明會，準確傳遞疾病專業知識和公司產品資訊。
  3. 經營醫院和診所，通過聽力篩檢增加轉介至門市的機會。
  4. 建立和維護與醫院和診所醫師的良好關係，促使醫師轉介病人至門市進行聽檢和助聽器試聽。
  5. 尋找和維持與醫院的合作機會，提升科林的知名度。
  6. 開發其他相關醫療照護機構，如藥局和長照中心，尋求轉介機會。
  7. 傳遞專業資訊，讓醫療相關從業人員了解改善聽損和睡眠呼吸中止症的專業意見。

<期待特質>
- 強大的領導能力和業務策略制定經驗。
- 優秀的溝通和團隊合作能力，能夠有效地培訓和激勵下屬。
- 具備策劃和實施社區和醫療機構合作活動的經驗。
- 能夠有效地推動業績增長和市場拓展。
- 有醫療相關領域的經驗者優先考慮。

<關於團隊>
我們的團隊是一個充滿活力和合作精神的集體，致力於實現業績目標和業務增長。我們重視每位成員的貢獻，並提供充分的支持和資源來幫助大家達成目標。我們期待那些具有領導力、積極進取並願意接受挑戰的人加入我們的團隊，共同推動業務發展和市場擴展。

<About the Job>
Clinico Group is a leading brand in the hearing aid industry, committed to continuous innovation and progress while actively expanding the market. Clinico Group was honored with the National Rock Award in 2020: 
https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764

<Why We Have This Role>
To provide comprehensive auditory and visual health services, enhancing the hearing and vision of Chinese communities worldwide.
Short films:
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<How You'll Find Success>
With the increasing market demand and the expansion of business objectives, this role is crucial in driving team performance growth and supporting the training and enhancement of the team's professional skills. It plays a key role in achieving business growth and market expansion.

<How You Grow>
In this position, you will have the chance to develop exceptional leadership and strategic planning skills. You will be responsible for effectively leading the team to meet monthly, quarterly, and annual performance targets while providing professional training to enhance the team's business capabilities. Through planning and overseeing community events, hospital collaborations, and other business development strategies, you will significantly boost the team's performance and increase the company’s market share.

<Things You Will Do>
- Achieve the team’s monthly, quarterly, and annual performance targets.
- Oversee the training and skill development of subordinate business personnel.
- Plan and supervise team activities to accomplish the following:
  1. Organize events to enhance Colin Hearing Aids’ visibility and recognition in the community, thereby increasing foot traffic and conversion rates at our stores.
  2.Conduct product information sessions at hospitals and clinics to accurately communicate expertise on hearing-related conditions and details about our products.
  3.  Manage relationships with hospitals and clinics to facilitate referrals to our stores through hearing screenings.
  4. Establish and maintain strong relationships with doctors at hospitals and clinics to encourage them to refer patients to our stores for hearing tests and hearing aid trials.
  5. Identify and maintain opportunities for collaboration with hospitals to enhance Colin's brand recognition.
  6. Develop connections with other relevant healthcare providers, such as pharmacies and long-term care centers, to seek referral opportunities.
  7. Share professional insights with healthcare professionals to educate them on improving hearing loss and sleep apnea.

<What We're Looking for on Your Resume>

-Strong Leadership and Strategic Planning Experience
- Excellent Communication and Teamwork Skills
- Experience in Community and Healthcare Collaboration
-Proven Ability to Drive Performance and Market Expansion
-Preference for Healthcare Experience

1.醫療相關產品行銷推廣
2.醫院/診所體系通路聯繫及開發
3.開發及關係經營：拜訪固定或非固定公司客戶，進行名單開發及關係維護
4.售後服務之提供：協助客戶使用產品及問題諮詢，提供新通路商相關之行銷或經營輔導

6.在各通路或賣場中擔任商品解說、產品諮詢的工作，並適時進行商品推廣及行銷

raw_benefits:
本集團致力打造一個能讓員工無後顧之憂的工作環境，努力健全各項制度，提供豐富完善的福利措施，使每位員工及其家庭都能享受舒適愉悅的生活，感受公司給予的關懷與用心。

1.考勤制度：
1)內勤人員上下班前後彈性30分鐘工時-有8:00/8:30/9:00三種班別可選擇(擇一，固定式)。
2)全集團同仁優於給予，午休時間由一小時多延長30分鐘，下班時間不變。

2.薪資制度：
1)年終獎金-依「員工績效考核辦法」評核，於年度終了視集團整體營運狀況予以發放年終獎金。
2)年度盈餘員工酬勞-經股東會承認盈餘分派表分後分配予本集團員工，配發標準依「員工酬勞辦法」辦理。
3)員工入股、現金增資認股、發行員工認股權憑證-視整體營運所需辦理並制定相關辦法以利員工遵循之。
4)員工持股信託-依員工持股信託管理辦法辦理。

3.完善貼心的福利制度：
1)完善保險計劃-到職當日除依法為每位同仁投保勞工保險、全民健康保險外，亦加入完整的團體綜合保險，保障範圍包括壽險、意外險、醫療險、癌症險、防疫險..等。
2)三節禮金。
3)健康檢查-全額補助新進員工健康檢查外，滿一年以上之員工享有每兩年一次集團舉辦之健康檢查。
4)提供員工出差或受訓免費住宿。
5)職工福利委員會各項補助支出-
(1)喪葬補助
(2)醫療補助
(3)結婚補助
(4)國內/國外旅遊補助
(5)生日/三節禮金
(6)生育補助
(7)進修補助
(8)年終尾牙
(9)不定期舉辦活動-如中秋烤肉。
4.學習與發展：
1)教育訓練-
(1)職前訓練
(2)企業內/外部訓練
(3)國外研修訓練
2)各類專業證照獎勵申請與核發-
依據內部辦法給予專業證照獎勵及補助該證照報名費用。

job_name: 【科林】Sales Representative 醫療業務代表 (嘉義、台南)
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
<關於職缺>
科林助聽器為業界聽覺輔具的領導品牌，秉持著不斷創新與進步的理念，積極拓展市場
科林榮獲2020國家磐石獎: https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764

<職位提供服務>
提供全方位的視聽保健服務，促進全球華人的耳聰目明
科林微電影: 
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<獲得成就> 
隨著市場需求的增加和業務目標的擴大，推動團隊業績的增長，並且協助培訓和提升團隊的專業技能。這個角色對於實現業務增長和擴展市場具有關鍵作用。

<成長機會>
在這個角色中，你將有機會發展出色的領導和策略制定技能。你的領導能力和策劃能力。你需要有效地帶領團隊達成月度、季度和年度的業績目標，同時提供專業的培訓以提升團隊的業務能力。通過策畫和督導社區活動、醫院合作及其他業務拓展策略，你將能夠顯著提升團隊的績效和公司的市場份額。

<工作內容>
1、醫院及診所客戶關係經營及開發
2、舉辦醫院與診所之服務說明會
3、開發其他相關醫療照護機構
4、協助醫院招標案
【註 】底薪外另有額外業績獎金

<期待特質>
- 強大的領導能力和業務策略制定經驗。
- 優秀的溝通和團隊合作能力，能夠有效地培訓和激勵下屬。
- 具備策劃和實施社區和醫療機構合作活動的經驗。
- 能夠有效地推動業績增長和市場拓展。
- 有醫療相關領域的經驗者優先考慮。

<關於團隊>
我們的團隊是一個充滿活力和合作精神的集體，致力於實現業績目標和業務增長。我們重視每位成員的貢獻，並提供充分的支持和資源來幫助大家達成目標。我們期待那些具有領導力、積極進取並願意接受挑戰的人加入我們的團隊，共同推動業務發展和市場擴展。

<About the Job>
Clinico Group is a leading brand in the hearing aid industry, committed to continuous innovation and progress while actively expanding the market. Clinico Group was honored with the National Rock Award in 2020: 
https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764

<Why We Have This Role>
To provide comprehensive auditory and visual health services, enhancing the hearing and vision of Chinese communities worldwide.
Short films:
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<How You'll Find Success>
With the increasing market demand and the expansion of business objectives, this role is crucial in driving team performance growth and supporting the training and enhancement of the team's professional skills. It plays a key role in achieving business growth and market expansion.

<How You Grow>
In this position, you will have the chance to develop exceptional leadership and strategic planning skills. You will be responsible for effectively leading the team to meet monthly, quarterly, and annual performance targets while providing professional training to enhance the team's business capabilities. Through planning and overseeing community events, hospital collaborations, and other business development strategies, you will significantly boost the team's performance and increase the company's market share.

<Things You Will Do>

1. Build and maintain strong connections with existing and potential hospital and clinic partners.
2. Conduct informative sessions at hospitals and clinics to present services and products.
3. Explore and establish relationships with additional relevant healthcare providers.
4. Support hospitals in their bidding processes for various projects.

**Note**: In addition to a base salary, there are additional performance-based bonuses.

<What We're Looking for on Your Resume>

-Strong Leadership and Strategic Planning Experience
- Excellent Communication and Teamwork Skills
- Experience in Community and Healthcare Collaboration
-Proven Ability to Drive Performance and Market Expansion
-Preference for Healthcare Experience

<What You Should Know About This Team>
Our sales team is vibrant and enthusiastic, embodying the dynamic spirit of Clinico. We are committed to upholding our core values of innovation, integrity, quality, collaboration, and sustainability. Joining us means becoming part of a team that thrives on creativity, teamwork, and a shared commitment to making a positive impact in our industry.

raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 【眼科儀器】維修工程師
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
About the Job

Our company is committed to advancing the field of ophthalmology in Greater China. We uphold a professional approach with a focus on "comprehensive equipment and superior service," earning a distinguished reputation within the domestic ophthalmology community. We continually introduce advanced international ophthalmic technologies and collaborate with ophthalmologists to elevate the standards of ophthalmology for the entire Chinese-speaking community.

公司致力於大中華眼科事業發展，本著專業化的經營理念，以“設備最全、服務至上”享譽國內眼科界，不斷引進國外先進眼科設備，與全體眼科醫師攜手並進，將全華人眼科推向一流水平的目標而努力。

Why We Have This Role

We prioritize customer satisfaction and product reliability. To ensure our ophthalmic equipment remains efficient and meets client needs, we require a skilled maintenance engineer to uphold our service quality and build customer trust.

我們重視客戶的滿意度和產品的可靠性，為了確保眼科設備能夠保持高效運行並滿足客戶需求，我們需要專業的維修工程師共同為公司的服務品質和客戶信任努力。

How You'll Find Success 

■Exceptional technical skills
■Outstanding customer service

■卓越的技術能力
■優秀的客戶服務能力

How You Grow

We value the professional development and personal growth of our employees. As a maintenance engineer, you will have opportunities to participate in the company’s technical training and learning programs, continuously enhancing your skills and knowledge.

我們重視員工的專業發展和個人成長。作為維修工程師，您將有機會參與公司的技術培訓和學習計劃，不斷提升您的技能和知識水平。

Things You Will Do

■Perform inspections and maintenance on ophthalmic equipment and related products.
■Support the sales department's goals by providing technical repair services.
■Operate and maintain the repair system and data, ensuring that service metrics and annual repair targets are met.
■Communicate directly with clients to explain the status of repairs and maintenance, ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction.
■Support other company maintenance projects, such as product maintenance campaigns.

■負責眼科儀器等相關產品的檢測及維修
■透過提供維修之技術服務，來支援業務部門相關目標的達成
■維修系統操作與資料維護，確保服務指標與維修年度目標達成。
■與客戶直接溝通，解說產品的維修/保養的狀態，確保客戶對服務的滿意度
■支援公司其他維修專案。如：產品巡迴保養活動

What We're Looking for on Your Resume

■Bachelor's degree or higher, with relevant repair experience.
■Proficient in customer service and after-sales follow-up.
■Strong teamwork and communication skills.

■大學以上畢業，具備維修經驗
■擅長顧客服務、售後追蹤
■具備良好的團體合作及溝通能力

What You Should Know About This Team

Our team is dedicated to delivering high-quality ophthalmic equipment and service solutions, with a focus on meeting diverse client needs. We prioritize innovation and technological advancement, continuously striving for excellence and a leading position in the industry, all while keeping customer satisfaction at the core of our efforts.

我們的團隊專注於提供高品質的眼科設備和服務解決方案，致力於滿足客戶多樣化的需求。我們重視創新和技術進步，並以客戶滿意度為中心，不斷追求卓越和行業領先地位。

raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

<關於職缺>
科林助聽器為業界聽覺輔具的領導品牌，秉持著不斷創新與進步的理念，積極拓展市場

致力培育聽力和呼吸治療領域菁英，透過多元學習方式強化其職能

具備提供客戶客製化的一對一的顧問式服務

<工作內容>
1.提供聽力輔具專業產品，進行衛教、選配和保健建議
2.提供睡眠呼吸正壓器專業產品，進行衛教、銷售服務和保健建議
3.產品銷售及售後追蹤
4.客戶關係管理，舊客與新客的關係維繫
5.相關行政/主管交辦事務

<期待特質>
★對門市諮詢、內勤業務銷售具熱忱者
★勇於挑戰：門店銷售業務經驗豐富、樂於追求高績效、具抗壓性
★服務熱忱：親切樂觀、善於與人互動和溝通傾聽
★主動積極、學習力高
★具備投入高成長潛力(醫療保健)產業的熱情
★助人為本，專業紮根以滿足健康需求

<關於團隊>
提供人才最優渥的薪資，包含業績獎金、年度獎金和年終另計，做越多領越多!
提供人才最充足的資源和舞台，除擁有完整新人知識培育，更舉辦每年專業評鑑，增加職場競爭力



<About the Job>
Clinico Group is a leading brand in the hearing aid industry, committed to continuous innovation and progress while actively expanding the market. Clinico Group was honored with the National Rock Award in 2020: 
https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764


<Why We Have This Role>
To provide comprehensive auditory and visual health services, enhancing the hearing and vision of Chinese communities worldwide.
Short films:
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<How You'll Find Success>
By raising awareness about hearing and sleep disorders, leading to improved quality of life for our customers.

<How You Grow>
We are dedicated to developing elite professionals in the fields of hearing and respiratory therapy, strengthening their skills through diverse learning methods. You'll gain expertise in providing professional health education, selection, and care, as well as customized one-on-one advisory services for clients.

<Things You Will Do>
1. Provide professional hearing aid products, including health education, selection advice, and care recommendations.
2. Provide professional products for sleep apnea therapy, including health education, sales service, and care recommendations.
3. Handle product sales and after-sales follow-up.
4. Manage customer relationships, maintaining connections with both existing and new clients.
5. Perform related administrative tasks and duties assigned by supervisors.

<What We're Looking for on Your Resume>
★ Passionate about in-store consultation and internal sales.
★ Ready for challenges: experienced in store sales, enthusiastic about high performance, and resilient under pressure.
★ Service-oriented: friendly, optimistic, and skilled in interaction and communication.
★ Proactive and eager to learn.
★ Passionate about the high-growth healthcare industry.
★ Dedicated to helping others with a strong professional foundation to meet health needs.

<What You Should Know About This Team>
1. We offer competitive salaries with performance bonuses, annual bonuses, and additional rewards—earn more based on your achievements!
2. We provide ample resources and opportunities, including comprehensive training for newcomers and annual professional evaluations to enhance career competitiveness.

job_name: 【IB】健康顧問-屏東門市(通過考核首年月薪45K，非醫療背景可)
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
About the Job 

"Pursuing Excellence, Upholding Professionalism" is the core value of Hear Better Hearing Center. We are committed to continuously enhancing our expertise and providing personalized services. With passion and professionalism, we support individuals with hearing needs in courageously pursuing their ideal lives and fully enjoying every memorable moment.
Hear Better Hearing Center official website:https://www.ibelive.com.tw

｢追求卓越，堅持專業｣是IB助聽中心的核心價值。我們追求不斷精進專業能力，我們堅持提供個人化服務。以熱忱與專業陪伴所有聽力需求者勇敢追求自我理想生活，盡情享受每一個值得紀念的精采時刻。
IB助聽中心官網: https://www.ibelive.com.tw

Why We Have This Role

Hear Better Hearing Center, we pride ourselves on our team of seasoned professionals who provide comprehensive services for all hearing needs. We have pioneered a 5-minute rapid hearing test to help consumers quickly screen for hearing issues. With our advanced equipment, we accurately analyze your hearing condition, eliminating the need for hospital or clinic visits and delivering the most professional hearing care directly to you.

IB助聽中心擁有一群資深的專業服務團隊，能為所有聽力需求者提供完整的服務，首創5分鐘快速聽力測試，幫助消費者快速篩檢聽力問題，並擁有先進的設備，準確地分析您的聽力情況，免去醫院或診所的往返直接給您最專業的聽力服務。

How You'll Find Success 

Successfully increasing customer awareness of hearing and sleep disorders will contribute to improved quality of life for our clients. Your ability to educate and address these concerns effectively will enhance customer satisfaction and trust.

提高顧客對聽覺與睡眠等疾病意識，有更好的生活品質

How You Grow

No prior experience is necessary; we offer a comprehensive 3-month paid training program. This includes classroom instruction as well as ongoing mentorship from experienced professionals. After passing the assessments, you will become a certified hearing specialist with the potential to earn high commission-based bonuses.

無相關背景亦可，提供3個月嚴謹並專業的給薪培訓，課堂之外還配有資深小老師中長期輔導協助，考核通過成為專業選配師!通過考核後享高抽成獎金!

Things You Will Do

1.Deliver Expert Educational Services and Consultations: Provide comprehensive education and guidance to clients on how hearing and sleep health significantly impact their overall quality of life.
2.Conduct Detailed Assessments: Evaluate client needs by performing thorough hearing and respiratory assessments to identify and understand their specific concerns and conditions.
3.Utilize Consultative Sales Techniques: Implement a consultative approach to promote assistive devices, aiming to enhance clients' auditory and sleep quality through tailored solutions.
4.Ensure Ongoing Support and Client Relationship Management: After equipment purchase, offer regular follow-up to monitor usage, address any issues, and maintain strong client relationships through consistent care and support.

1. 專業衛教服務與諮詢，讓顧客了解聽覺與睡眠對與生活的影響性
2. 了解顧客的需求，為顧客進行聽力和呼吸檢測，了解其困擾程度
3. 顧問式銷售方式進行輔具推廣，改善其聽覺、睡眠品質
4. 設備購買後之定期追蹤和關懷使用狀況、維護客情

What We're Looking for on Your Resume

★Passion for Sales and Client Consultation: Enthusiasm for both retail consulting and internal business sales roles.
★Challenging Spirit: Extensive experience in retail sales, a drive for high performance, and the ability to thrive under pressure.
★Service-Oriented Attitude: Friendly, optimistic, and adept at interacting with and listening to clients.
★Proactive and Eager to Learn
★Genuine passion for contributing to the growth of the healthcare sector.
★ A dedication to helping others with a solid professional foundation to meet health needs effectively.

★對門市諮詢、內勤業務銷售具熱忱者
★勇於挑戰：門店銷售業務經驗豐富、樂於追求高績效、具抗壓性
★服務熱忱：親切樂觀、善於與人互動和溝通傾聽
★主動積極、學習力高
★具備投入高成長潛力(醫療保健)產業的熱情
★助人為本，專業紮根以滿足健康需求

What You Should Know About This Team

We are passionate about acquiring and sharing knowledge in medical and equipment fields.
We approach our work with patience, care, and compassion, especially when serving senior clients.
We value a supportive career structure and are committed to talent development.
If you share these values and are eager to contribute, we welcome you to join us at Hear Better Hearing Center!

我們是一群樂在學習(醫療與儀器專業知識)、樂在服務(面對樂齡族耐心細心愛心)、樂在工作(職涯制度與人才培育計畫)的團隊，歡迎這樣的你一起加入IB助聽中心!

other_benefits_str: 年終獎金、三節獎金/禮品、咖啡吧、結婚禮金、生育津貼、社團補助、員工進修補助、住院慰問金、交通津貼補助、部門聚餐、員工優惠、員工團體保險
raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 【耳科】電子耳業務助理
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
為什麼我們需要這個角色

隨著我們在市場上不斷增長和擴展，我們認識到需要一位專注且積極的團隊成員來協助管理銷售和客戶互動過程。電子耳業務助理將在確保順利運營、支持客戶查詢和推動銷售工作方面發揮至關重要的作用，幫助我們實現業務目標。

如何取得成功

您將通過將良好的溝通技巧與對產品的深入理解結合，提供卓越的客戶服務並推動銷售，從而在這個角色中取得成功。您能夠有效地與銷售團隊協作、理解客戶需求並提供量身定制的解決方案，將直接促進業務的成功。

如何成長

在科林集團，我們重視您的專業發展。隨著您在這個角色中的成長，您將有機會擴展在電子和音頻技術領域的知識，同時積累有價值的銷售操作和客戶關係管理經驗。我們將提供持續的培訓和指導，並有清晰的職業發展路徑，幫助您在公司內部實現升遷。

您將做的工作
【主要事務】
-耳科單位資料建檔排程統計
-耳科報表統計
-門市例行下單事務通知(操作ERP系統)、協助交貨
【其他協助】
-官方line相關訊息發送(含簡單圖素材設計)、客戶提醒
-官方line問題回覆


Why We Have This Role

As part of our continuous growth and expansion in the market, we recognize the need for a dedicated and proactive team member to assist in managing the sales and customer engagement processes. The Electronic Ear Sales Assistant will play a pivotal role in ensuring seamless operations, supporting customer inquiries, and driving sales efforts to help us achieve our business objectives.

How You'll Find Success

You will thrive in this role by combining your strong communication skills with a deep understanding of the product to offer excellent customer service and drive sales. Your ability to effectively collaborate with the sales team, understand client needs, and provide tailored solutions will directly contribute to the success of the business.

How You'll Grow

At Clinico Group, we prioritize your professional development. As you grow in this role, you will have opportunities to expand your knowledge in the electronics and audio technology sectors, while gaining valuable experience in sales operations and customer relationship management. You’ll be supported through ongoing training and mentoring, with clear pathways for career advancement within the company.

Things You Will Do

Primary Duties:
-Maintain and schedule data for the ENT (Ear, Nose, and Throat) department.
-Compile and analyze statistical reports for the ENT department.
-Handle routine order placements through the ERP system for the retail store and assist with delivery coordination.

Additional Support:
-Send messages through the official Line account, including designing simple graphics, and remind customers as needed.
-Respond to questions and issues via the official Line account.

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 【CC】中區業務(藥局&診所通路)範圍涵蓋台中和苗栗地區
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
為什麼我們需要這個職位
我們的業務正在不斷擴展，需要具備卓越銷售技能和市場開發能力的人才來推動業績成長，並確保我們的產品能夠在市場上佔有一席之地。

如何獲得成功
在這個職位中，成功的關鍵在於能夠有效管理客戶關係，達成或超越業績目標，並積極參與市場行銷活動以擴展我們的市場份額。

成長機會
您將有機會接觸並熟悉多樣化的產品線，從保健營養品、美妝保養品到醫療器材。此外，您將在一個充滿支持和協作的團隊中工作，並通過公司提供的豐富資源與培訓計劃，不斷提升自身技能和專業知識。

你將做的事情 
• 管理業績目標：每月/每年目標規劃及業績達成。
• 管理客戶庫存和應收帳款。
• 推動產品銷售，達成業績目標，包括開發新客戶和維護舊客戶關係。
• 配合市場行銷活動，如展會和會議等。
• 主要客戶包括藥妝通路、藥局及診所。
• 銷售產品範圍涵蓋保健營養品、美妝保養品及醫材。


關於這個團隊您應該知道的事情
我們的團隊充滿熱情和活力，致力於推動公司在醫療保健市場的成長。我們提供豐厚的業績獎金，並為業務人員提供配車及車資津貼。我們期待能夠與您一起，為台灣的醫療保健做出貢獻。


About the job
Are you eager to join the largest medical and healthcare group in Taiwan? Do you want to make a meaningful contribution to Taiwan's healthcare industry? If so, welcome to the Clinico family, the coolest team in Taiwan!

Why we have this role
Our business is continuously expanding, and we need talented individuals with exceptional sales skills and market development capabilities to drive growth and ensure our products have a strong presence in the market.

How you'll find success
Success in this role hinges on your ability to effectively manage customer relationships, meet or exceed sales targets, and actively participate in marketing activities to expand our market share.

How you grow
You will have the opportunity to work with a diverse product line, from health supplements and beauty care products to medical devices. Additionally, you will work in a supportive and collaborative team environment, with access to ample resources and training programs to continually enhance your skills and expertise.

Things you will do
•  Manage sales targets: Plan and achieve monthly/yearly targets.
•  Manage customer inventory and accounts receivable.
•  Drive product sales to meet targets, including developing new customers and maintaining relationships with existing ones.
•  Participate in marketing activities, such as exhibitions and conferences.
•  Engage with key customers, including drugstore chains, pharmacies, and clinics.
•  Handle a range of products, including health supplements, beauty care products, and medical devices.

raw_benefits:
本集團致力打造一個能讓員工無後顧之憂的工作環境，努力健全各項制度，提供豐富完善的福利措施，使每位員工及其家庭都能享受舒適愉悅的生活，感受公司給予的關懷與用心。

1.考勤制度：
1)內勤人員上下班前後彈性30分鐘工時-有8:00/8:30/9:00三種班別可選擇(擇一，固定式)。
2)全集團同仁優於給予，午休時間由一小時多延長30分鐘，下班時間不變。

2.薪資制度：
1)年終獎金-依「員工績效考核辦法」評核，於年度終了視集團整體營運狀況予以發放年終獎金。
2)年度盈餘員工酬勞-經股東會承認盈餘分派表分後分配予本集團員工，配發標準依「員工酬勞辦法」辦理。
3)員工入股、現金增資認股、發行員工認股權憑證-視整體營運所需辦理並制定相關辦法以利員工遵循之。
4)員工持股信託-依員工持股信託管理辦法辦理。

3.完善貼心的福利制度：
1)完善保險計劃-到職當日除依法為每位同仁投保勞工保險、全民健康保險外，亦加入完整的團體綜合保險，保障範圍包括壽險、意外險、醫療險、癌症險、防疫險..等。
2)三節禮金。
3)健康檢查-全額補助新進員工健康檢查外，滿一年以上之員工享有每兩年一次集團舉辦之健康檢查。
4)提供員工出差或受訓免費住宿。
5)職工福利委員會各項補助支出-
(1)喪葬補助
(2)醫療補助
(3)結婚補助
(4)國內/國外旅遊補助
(5)生日/三節禮金
(6)生育補助
(7)進修補助
(8)年終尾牙
(9)不定期舉辦活動-如中秋烤肉。
4.學習與發展：
1)教育訓練-
(1)職前訓練
(2)企業內/外部訓練
(3)國外研修訓練
2)各類專業證照獎勵申請與核發-
依據內部辦法給予專業證照獎勵及補助該證照報名費用。

Clinico Group is a leading brand in the hearing aid industry, committed to continuous innovation and progress while actively expanding the market. Clinico Group was honored with the National Rock Award in 2020:

2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<How You'll Find Success>
By raising awareness about hearing and sleep disorders, leading to improved quality of life for our customers.

<How You Grow>
We are dedicated to developing elite professionals in the fields of hearing and respiratory therapy, strengthening their skills through diverse learning methods. You'll gain expertise in providing professional health education, selection, and care, as well as customized one-on-one advisory services for clients.

<Things You Will Do>
1. Provide professional hearing aid products, including health education, selection advice, and care recommendations.
2. Provide professional products for sleep apnea therapy, including health education, sales service, and care recommendations.
3. Handle product sales and after-sales follow-up.
4. Manage customer relationships, maintaining connections with both existing and new clients.
5. Perform related administrative tasks and duties assigned by supervisors.

<What We're Looking for on Your Resume>
★ Passionate about in-store consultation and internal sales.
★ Ready for challenges: experienced in store sales, enthusiastic about high performance, and resilient under pressure.
★ Service-oriented: friendly, optimistic, and skilled in interaction and communication.
★ Proactive and eager to learn.
★ Passionate about the high-growth healthcare industry.
★ Dedicated to helping others with a strong professional foundation to meet health needs.

<What You Should Know About This Team>
1. We offer competitive salaries with performance bonuses, annual bonuses, and additional rewards—earn more based on your achievements!
2. We provide ample resources and opportunities, including comprehensive training for newcomers and annual professional evaluations to enhance career competitiveness.

raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 【HA】醫療聽力睡眠輔具門市區督導(新竹)
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
About the Job

We are looking for a dedicated Medical Hearing and Sleep Aids Supervisor to join our vibrant team. This role involves overseeing the development and management of innovative solutions in the medical hearing and sleep aid sectors. As part of the Clinico Group, you will be responsible for ensuring that our products and services meet the highest standards of quality and effectiveness, while also contributing to the advancement of our core values.

我們正在尋找一位專業且富有創意的醫療聽力及睡眠輔助裝置主管加入我們充滿活力的團隊。這個角色涉及監督醫療聽力及睡眠輔助裝置的開發和管理工作。作為科林的一員，您將負責確保我們的產品和服務達到最高的質量和效果標準，同時推動我們核心價值觀的實現。

Why We Have This Role

The Medical Hearing and Sleep Aids Supervisor position was established to lead and coordinate efforts in creating and optimizing products that enhance patients' quality of life. With a growing demand for advanced hearing and sleep solutions, this role is crucial for ensuring that our offerings are at the forefront of medical innovation and meet the evolving needs of our customers.

設立醫療聽力及睡眠輔助裝置主管這一職位是為了領導和協調創新解決方案的開發與優化，滿足不斷增長的需求。這個角色對於確保我們的產品領先於醫療創新，並滿足客戶日益增長的需求至關重要。

How You'll Find Success

Success in this role will be achieved through your ability to effectively manage projects, oversee the implementation of cutting-edge technologies, and ensure regulatory compliance. You will excel by fostering a collaborative environment, driving innovation, and maintaining a focus on delivering high-quality, patient-centric solutions. Your proactive approach and strategic vision will be essential in achieving our objectives and contributing to our overall success.

成功的關鍵在於有效管理項目，監督尖端技術的實施，並確保符合相關法規。您將通過促進合作環境、推動創新並專注於提供高質量以病人為中心的解決方案來脫穎而出。您的主動性和戰略視野將對實現我們的目標和整體成功至關重要。

How You'll Grow

We possess comprehensive knowledge and training in hearing healthcare, aimed at cultivating elite talents in both related and unrelated fields. Our expertise and attentive, warm services in hearing care are dedicated to assisting more seniors who need professional support, thereby enhancing the quality of life in an aging society.*

我們擁有完整的聽力保健知識與教育訓練，用以培育相關、非相關領域之人才菁英，將我們聽力保健的專業、細心溫暖的服務，幫助更多需要專業協助的樂齡者，提升高齡時代的生活品質！

Things You Will Do

1.Execute business operations according to company policies and standard operating procedures.
2.Oversee regional operational plans and achieve company performance goals by monitoring and managing store performance, providing guidance and support.
3.Possess skills in store organization, leadership, and communication, as well as abilities in business analysis and resource integration.
4.Conduct employee training and needs analysis, and manage training, motivation, and guidance.
5.Prepare budgets and manage cost control.
6.Manage crises and handle issues.
7.Address and resolve customer complaints.
8.Conduct store inspections and implement problem-solving measures.
9.Provide on-site support for stores experiencing staffing shortages as needed.
10.Perform other duties as assigned by business needs.

*Shift schedules will be arranged flexibly based on store operational conditions and staffing needs.

工作內容：
01. 依據公司之既定政策，標準作業程序執行從事營業工作。
02. 督導區域營運計劃及達成公司營運目標，執行追蹤門市經營績效輔導與管理。
03. 具有門市工作組織和領導技能及溝通協調能力，經營分析與整合資源能力。
04. 員工教育訓練與需求分析人員培訓、激勵、輔導與管理 。
05. 預算編製與成本控管
06.危機與議題管理
07.客訴案件處理 。
08.門市巡視/問題改善。
09.若機動支援門市現場人力不足之空缺
10.因業務需要需接受臨時交待工作事項

*班別依門市營運狀況及人力需求彈性安排。

• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 【眼科儀器】北區業務代表
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
關於職缺
公司致力於大中華眼科事業發展，本著專業化的經營理念，以“設備最全、服務至上”享譽國內眼科界，不斷引進國外先進眼科設備，與全體眼科醫師攜手並進，將全華人眼科推向一流水平的目標而努力。

職位提供服務
這個角色對於公司至關重要，因為它直接關聯到市場的業務拓展和客戶關係管理。我們需要一位專業的業務代表來開發新客戶、維護現有客戶，並確保達成業績目標。通過這個角色，我們希望提升市場佔比，增強品牌影響力，並保持與客戶的長期合作關係。

獲得成就
■積極尋找和接洽新客戶，提供優質的服務以保持現有客戶的滿意度，並確保訂單和帳務的準確處理。
■了解市場需求，掌握行業趨勢，並迅速響應客戶需求，解決問題，從而提升銷售業績和客戶忠誠度。

成長機會
公司將為您提供專業的培訓和發展機會，幫助您提升業務技能和行業知識。隨著您在工作中的表現和業績提升，您將有機會參與更高層次的業務策略規劃，甚至晉升到更高級別的管理職位。

工作內容
■從事眼科儀器設備的銷售並達成銷售目標。
■開發並維護診所、醫院等客戶，建立並鞏固客戶關係。
■負責國內業務的接洽、訂單處理、帳務管理以及客情維護，確保業務流程順利。
■處理責任區域內的異常報告，及時解決問題以維護公司形象。
■掌握市場變化，提供解決方案，協助客戶解決問題並提供專業建議。

期待條件
■專科以上畢業，英文聽說讀寫順暢
■具醫療保健相關工作經驗者佳
■重視團隊合作
■歡迎社會新鮮人及無經驗者

關於團隊
我們的團隊專注於提供高品質的眼科設備和服務解決方案，致力於滿足客戶多樣化的需求。我們重視創新和技術進步，並以客戶滿意度為中心，不斷追求卓越和行業領先地位。


About the Job
We are dedicated to advancing ophthalmology in Greater China with a focus on professionalism, comprehensive equipment, and top-notch service. We continuously introduce advanced international ophthalmic equipment and collaborate with ophthalmologists to elevate Chinese ophthalmology to top-tier standards.

Why We Have This Role
This role is vital for expanding market presence and managing client relationships. We need a sales representative to attract new clients, maintain existing ones, and meet performance targets, aiming to increase market share, enhance brand influence, and ensure long-term client partnerships.

How You'll Find Success
■Proactively acquire new clients and provide excellent service to retain existing ones, ensuring accurate order and account handling.
■Understand market demands and trends, respond quickly to client needs, and solve problems to boost sales and client loyalty.

How You Grow
The company offers professional training and development to improve your business skills and industry knowledge. With strong performance, you'll have opportunities for higher-level strategy roles and senior management positions.

Things You Will Do
■Sell ophthalmic instruments and achieve sales targets.
■Develop and maintain relationships with clinics, hospitals, and other clients.
■Handle domestic business dealings, order processing, account management, and client relations.
■Address issues in your area and provide timely solutions to maintain the company’s image.
■Stay updated on market changes and offer solutions and professional advice to clients.

What We're Looking for on Your Resume
■Diploma or higher, fluent in English.
■Healthcare-related experience is a plus.
■Team-oriented.
■Open to fresh graduates and those without prior experience.

What You Should Know About This Team
Our team provides high-quality ophthalmic equipment and services, focusing on client satisfaction, innovation, and industry leadership.

job_description:

2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

提高顧客對聽覺與睡眠等疾病意識，有更好的生活品質

致力培育聽力和呼吸治療領域菁英，透過多元學習方式強化其職能
具備提供客戶專業衛教諮詢、選配和保健等能力
具備提供客戶客製化的一對一的顧問式服務

<工作內容>
1.提供聽力輔具專業產品，進行衛教、選配和保健建議
2.提供睡眠呼吸正壓器專業產品，進行衛教、銷售服務和保健建議
3.產品銷售及售後追蹤
4.客戶關係管理，舊客與新客的關係維繫
5.相關行政/主管交辦事務

<期待特質>
★對門市諮詢、內勤業務銷售具熱忱者
★勇於挑戰：門店銷售業務經驗豐富、樂於追求高績效、具抗壓性
★服務熱忱：親切樂觀、善於與人互動和溝通傾聽
★主動積極、學習力高
★具備投入高成長潛力(醫療保健)產業的熱情
★助人為本，專業紮根以滿足健康需求

<關於團隊>
提供人才最優渥的薪資，包含業績獎金、年度獎金和年終另計，做越多領越多!
提供人才最充足的資源和舞台，除擁有完整新人知識培育，更舉辦每年專業評鑑，增加職場競爭力



<About the Job>
Clinico Group is a leading brand in the hearing aid industry, committed to continuous innovation and progress while actively expanding the market. Clinico Group was honored with the National Rock Award in 2020: 
https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764


<Why We Have This Role>
To provide comprehensive auditory and visual health services, enhancing the hearing and vision of Chinese communities worldwide.
Short films:
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<How You'll Find Success>
By raising awareness about hearing and sleep disorders, leading to improved quality of life for our customers.

<How You Grow>
We are dedicated to developing elite professionals in the fields of hearing and respiratory therapy, strengthening their skills through diverse learning methods. You'll gain expertise in providing professional health education, selection, and care, as well as customized one-on-one advisory services for clients.

<Things You Will Do>
1. Provide professional hearing aid products, including health education, selection advice, and care recommendations.
2. Provide professional products for sleep apnea therapy, including health education, sales service, and care recommendations.
3. Handle product sales and after-sales follow-up.
4. Manage customer relationships, maintaining connections with both existing and new clients.
5. Perform related administrative tasks and duties assigned by supervisors.

<What We're Looking for on Your Resume>
★ Passionate about in-store consultation and internal sales.
★ Ready for challenges: experienced in store sales, enthusiastic about high performance, and resilient under pressure.
★ Service-oriented: friendly, optimistic, and skilled in interaction and communication.
★ Proactive and eager to learn.
★ Passionate about the high-growth healthcare industry.
★ Dedicated to helping others with a strong professional foundation to meet health needs.

<What You Should Know About This Team>
1. We offer competitive salaries with performance bonuses, annual bonuses, and additional rewards—earn more based on your achievements!
2. We provide ample resources and opportunities, including comprehensive training for newcomers and annual professional evaluations to enhance career competitiveness.

★勇於挑戰：門店銷售業務經驗豐富、樂於追求高績效、具抗壓性
★服務熱忱：親切樂觀、善於與人互動和溝通傾聽
★主動積極、學習力高
★具備投入高成長潛力(醫療保健)產業的熱情
★助人為本，專業紮根以滿足健康需求

<關於團隊>
提供人才最優渥的薪資，包含業績獎金、年度獎金和年終另計，做越多領越多!
提供人才最充足的資源和舞台，除擁有完整新人知識培育，更舉辦每年專業評鑑，增加職場競爭力



<About the Job>
Clinico Group is a leading brand in the hearing aid industry, committed to continuous innovation and progress while actively expanding the market. Clinico Group was honored with the National Rock Award in 2020: 
https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764


<Why We Have This Role>
To provide comprehensive auditory and visual health services, enhancing the hearing and vision of Chinese communities worldwide.
Short films:
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<How You'll Find Success>
By raising awareness about hearing and sleep disorders, leading to improved quality of life for our customers.

<How You Grow>
We are dedicated to developing elite professionals in the fields of hearing and respiratory therapy, strengthening their skills through diverse learning methods. You'll gain expertise in providing professional health education, selection, and care, as well as customized one-on-one advisory services for clients.

<Things You Will Do>
1. Provide professional hearing aid products, including health education, selection advice, and care recommendations.
2. Provide professional products for sleep apnea therapy, including health education, sales service, and care recommendations.
3. Handle product sales and after-sales follow-up.
4. Manage customer relationships, maintaining connections with both existing and new clients.
5. Perform related administrative tasks and duties assigned by supervisors.

<What We're Looking for on Your Resume>
★ Passionate about in-store consultation and internal sales.
★ Ready for challenges: experienced in store sales, enthusiastic about high performance, and resilient under pressure.
★ Service-oriented: friendly, optimistic, and skilled in interaction and communication.
★ Proactive and eager to learn.
★ Passionate about the high-growth healthcare industry.
★ Dedicated to helping others with a strong professional foundation to meet health needs.

<What You Should Know About This Team>
1. We offer competitive salaries with performance bonuses, annual bonuses, and additional rewards—earn more based on your achievements!
2. We provide ample resources and opportunities, including comprehensive training for newcomers and annual professional evaluations to enhance career competitiveness.

raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 業務專員
company_name: 新芳良化工原料儀器有限公司
job_description:
1.限化工科、藥專、藥學系、應用化學、食品營養系、環工系及相關化學科系畢. 

1.有汽車駕照經驗者 

2.對雲嘉南及高屏地區路況熟悉者優先錄用 

3.公司有固定客戶群各產業公司及專訪學校 

4.月薪35000元至40000元以上,能力強者另議,晉升視工作能力而定。

歡迎
所有求職者

發展/遠景：
本公司已開業60餘年，主要產品是各國化學儀器、化工原料、試藥、各種玻璃耗材等，目前各大.學、專科、高中職、國中學校開學，強力推廣化學藥品、實驗器材、玻璃器材等。 

公司簡介 

本公司創立於民國68年,主要產品是儀器、化工原料、化學藥品、物理生物、醫療服務等相關買賣、製造業務。目前加強販售DIY美容產品，獲得消費者及大迴響，未來將有新產品陸續推出。 

 

產品或服務介紹 

精密科學儀器、化工原料、特殊試藥、各研究單位、工廠之原料、最新教學儀器、生化培養、檢驗、分析、品管、試藥， 貴金屬電鍍藥品、環保、公害、水質、噪音、地科、生物、掛圖、標本、模型、幻燈片視聽器材、歐美醫療儀器、保健室用儀器、獸醫儀器、瑞士METTLER電子天平系列、家庭用及復健儀器、日本OLYMPUS顯微鏡實體解剖系列。

job_name: 門診護理組-定期(約聘)時薪助理員(員林基督教醫院)
company_name: 彰化基督教醫療財團法人彰化基督教醫院
job_description:
一、工作內容：
     1.協助醫師看診。
     2.執行門診相關作業流程。
     3.執行醫療儀器及器械之準備及管理。
     4.執行護理主管指派、交託之工作。
     5.其他依工作說明書需配合事項。
二、薪資：時薪195~205元。
三、完整又多元專業訓練：
     1.在職教育課程(單位課程、院內外專業課程/研習會、數位學習網/KM/視訊連線課程、跨團隊教育訓練)。
     2.次專科培訓課程。
     3.本院為彰基體系分院，新人有”學習手冊”，逐步學習，完成手冊，就可以獨立上線，執行工作。
     4.全院性課程：新人訓練、病人安全、感控、退修會、週會禮拜、父母成長團體等多元化豐富課程。【假別依照醫院規範】
四、晉升機制：表現良好、主管肯定，且院內有正職缺額，有機會晉升正職人員。
五、主管領導：
     1.人性化管理。
     2.專業能力導向。
     3.重視良性溝通/友善工作環境。
六、福利事項：
     1.本職缺屬定期人力，無三節獎金(中秋節、端午節、年終)。
     2.福利補助金項目：結婚、生育、住院、喪葬、員工旅遊。
     3.醫療優待：彰基全體系【對象：配偶、子女、父母、公婆、岳父母】。
     4.其他：運動會、生日福利券、免費生日體檢、員工福利社購物85折…等。
     5.嶄新員工宿舍(鄰近員林火車站，生活機能方便，2F是健身房，1F是7-11)。
     6.其他福利事項，請洽詳洽彰基職福會網站https://dpt.cch.org.tw/layout/layout_2/about.aspx?Key=64&ID=9090
七、排班：單位依人力、診次排班。
八、醫療團隊合作：
     1.本單位配置”護理師”/”助理員”/ ”事務員”各司其職，團隊合作。
     2.門診區有”義工”協助指引，順暢就醫流程。
九、人力運用：設有”機動人力”，因應門診各式需求，有支援機制。
十、本院為智慧醫院、設備新穎、醫療工作環境舒適、交通便利、美好發展前景，值得您投入，一起為南彰化鄉親服務。

★對門市諮詢、內勤業務銷售具熱忱者
★勇於挑戰：門店銷售業務經驗豐富、樂於追求高績效、具抗壓性
★服務熱忱：親切樂觀、善於與人互動和溝通傾聽
★主動積極、學習力高
★具備投入高成長潛力(醫療保健)產業的熱情
★助人為本，專業紮根以滿足健康需求

<關於團隊>
提供人才最優渥的薪資，包含業績獎金、年度獎金和年終另計，做越多領越多!
提供人才最充足的資源和舞台，除擁有完整新人知識培育，更舉辦每年專業評鑑，增加職場競爭力



<About the Job>
Clinico Group is a leading brand in the hearing aid industry, committed to continuous innovation and progress while actively expanding the market. Clinico Group was honored with the National Rock Award in 2020: 
https://money.udn.com/money/story/5635/4985764


<Why We Have This Role>
To provide comprehensive auditory and visual health services, enhancing the hearing and vision of Chinese communities worldwide.
Short films:
2020老爸幫幫忙 https://reurl.cc/Ezbvra
2019需要被聽見 https://reurl.cc/L1281x

<How You'll Find Success>
By raising awareness about hearing and sleep disorders, leading to improved quality of life for our customers.

<How You Grow>
We are dedicated to developing elite professionals in the fields of hearing and respiratory therapy, strengthening their skills through diverse learning methods. You'll gain expertise in providing professional health education, selection, and care, as well as customized one-on-one advisory services for clients.

<Things You Will Do>
1. Provide professional hearing aid products, including health education, selection advice, and care recommendations.
2. Provide professional products for sleep apnea therapy, including health education, sales service, and care recommendations.
3. Handle product sales and after-sales follow-up.
4. Manage customer relationships, maintaining connections with both existing and new clients.
5. Perform related administrative tasks and duties assigned by supervisors.

<What We're Looking for on Your Resume>
★ Passionate about in-store consultation and internal sales.
★ Ready for challenges: experienced in store sales, enthusiastic about high performance, and resilient under pressure.
★ Service-oriented: friendly, optimistic, and skilled in interaction and communication.
★ Proactive and eager to learn.
★ Passionate about the high-growth healthcare industry.
★ Dedicated to helping others with a strong professional foundation to meet health needs.

<What You Should Know About This Team>
1. We offer competitive salaries with performance bonuses, annual bonuses, and additional rewards—earn more based on your achievements!
2. We provide ample resources and opportunities, including comprehensive training for newcomers and annual professional evaluations to enhance career competitiveness.

raw_benefits:
我們重視每一位員工的職涯發展與生活品質，並致力於提供完善的福利制度，讓您在工作中安心成長，開創未來：

• 員購優惠：以超優惠價格享受集團商品，涵蓋多元保健食品、助聽器、近視雷射、正壓呼吸器及美學課程等，照顧您的健康與生活。
• 福利假制度：享有優於勞基法的休假政策，讓您兼顧工作與生活。
• 全面保障：享有勞保、健保及退休金計畫，並提供多元團體保險，包括醫療險、意外險、壽險、癌症險及出差旅遊平安險等，全方位守護您的健康與未來安全。
• 福利委員會：專門設立的福利委員會，積極推動更多員工福利措施。
• 專業培訓：完善的國內外專業教育訓練，助您在職涯中不斷提升專業技能。
• 節慶獎金：中秋節、端午節及年終獎金，感謝您的努力與貢獻，與您一同分享成功的喜悅。
• 補助關懷：提供婚喪病喜慶的補助金，貼心陪伴您在人生的每一個重要時刻。
• 推薦獎勵：介紹優秀人才加入我們，您將獲得推薦獎金以及保健產品組合和美學課程作為獎勵。
• 知識成長：定期舉辦知識與心靈成長的讀書會，豐富您的學習與個人成長。
• 年資禮：根據您的年資提供獨特的禮物，以表彰您對公司的長期貢獻。

加入我們，與公司共同成長，一起邁向更美好的未來！

We value the career development and quality of life of every employee and are committed to providing a comprehensive benefits system to ensure you can grow confidently at work and build a brighter future:

• Employee Discounts: Enjoy exclusive discounts on a variety of company products, including health supplements, hearing aids, SMART TransPRK, CPAP machines, and medical aesthetic courses, ensuring both your health and well-being.
• Leave Benefits: Benefit from a leave policy that exceeds labor law requirements, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
• Comprehensive Coverage: Benefit from labor insurance, health insurance, and a pension plan, along with a range of group insurance options, including medical, accident, life, cancer, and business travel insurance. This extensive coverage ensures complete protection for your health and future security.
• Welfare Committee: A dedicated welfare committee is actively engaged in promoting more benefits for employees.
• Professional Training: Receive comprehensive domestic and international professional education and training to continuously enhance your skills.
• Festival Bonuses: Enjoy bonuses during the Mid-Autumn Festival, Dragon Boat Festival, and year-end, as a token of appreciation for your hard work and contributions.
• Supportive Subsidies: We provide financial support during important life events, such as weddings, funerals, hospitalization and injury/illness condolence, and maternity subsidy, offering care when you need it most.
• Referral Bonuses: Recommend talented individuals to join our team, and you will receive referral bonuses along with health product packages and medical aesthetic course rewards.
• Knowledge Growth: Participate in regular book clubs focused on knowledge and personal growth, enriching both your learning and personal development.
• Long Service Awards: Receive good gifts based on your tenure to honor your long-term contributions to the company.

Join us and grow alongside the company as we strive toward a brighter future together!

job_name: 醫事放射師(放射科技術員)(每月再發醫勤獎助金)
company_name: 三軍總醫院澎湖分院附設民眾診療服務處
job_description:
招考職缺及條件：【放射科技術員(醫事放射師)】
(一) 學歷：具國內外放射相關科系學士(含)以上學位。
(二) 具備證照：具醫事放射師證書、輻射防護人員證書或測驗及格通知書。
(三) 經歷：有臨床放射治療相關工作經驗較佳。
(四) 其他條件：無。

工作項目:
(一) 工作責任：
工作項目（執掌）：
1.製作放射治療固定模具。
2.電腦斷層模擬定位攝影。
3.拍攝放射治療驗證片。
4.執行放射治療療程。
5.放射診斷電腦斷層檢查。
6.核醫例行性醫療檢查任務執行。
7.指導實習放射師及在職放射師，指導其影像技術專業知識及臨床經驗。 
8.培養未來優秀的放射及影像技術人才。
9.參與或協助科內相關研究、教學專案與行政業務工作之推展。
10.基本輻射防護工作。
11.醫事放射實習生教學負責人。
(二) 職務內容：
該類人力整體運用規劃：任用後由單位負責規劃運用，負責:
1.製作放射治療固定模具。
2.電腦斷層模擬定位攝影。
3.拍攝放射治療驗證片。
4.執行放射治療療程。
5.放射診斷電腦斷層檢查。
6.核醫例行性醫療檢查任務執行。
7.指導實習放射師及在職放射師，指導其影像技術專業知識及臨床經驗。 
8.培養未來優秀的放射及影像技術人才。
9.參與或協助科內相關研究、教學專案與行政業務工作之推展。
10.基本輻射防護工作。
11.醫事放射實習生教學負責人。

薪資與福利：試用期及正式進用以放射科技術員聘一等一級48,790給薪(含地域加給)，年終獎金比照軍公教人員發放標準，本院員工享有健保、住院期間享有病房費優待，休假依勞基法規定。

考試項目：
(一)筆試及口試(選擇題)
(二)命題範圍：輻射防護、輻射生物學、輻射度量、輻射劑量學、游離輻射防護法規等。

錄取標準：
筆試70%、口試30%，筆、面試成績任一單項未達60分者不予錄取，總成績相同者以筆試成績高者優先錄取。

檢附資料：
個人簡歷、身分證正反面影本、最高學歷證明影本、證書影本、服務證明影本等。

一般規定：經考試通過但具有下列1至6項情形之ㄧ者，不得辦理進用：
(一) 檢附資料不全或不合格者。
(二) 通緝在案尚未結案者。
(三) 受有期徒刑之宣告，尚未結案或緩刑在案者。
(四) 受「監護宣告」及「輔助宣告」，尚未撤銷者。
(五) 大陸地區人民經許可進入臺灣地區，非在臺灣地區設有戶籍滿20年者或香港及澳門居民經許可進入臺灣地區，非在臺灣地區設有戶籍滿10者。
(六) 曾犯內亂外患罪經判決確定或曾服公職有貪污行為經判決確定或依法停止任用、受休職處分尚未期滿者。
(七) 違反國籍法規定者。
(八) 曾於公務機關或國防單位任軍、文職期間有思想、品德、操守等不良記錄者。
(九) 依「國軍生產及服務作業醫療事業基金聘雇人員管理作業規定」：通過本分院各類聘雇人員進用必須為單一『中華民國國籍』者，方可辦理進用。

薪資與福利措施
一、 福利津貼：
(一) 地域加給：每月可領7,150元(依規定調整)。
(二) 休假獎金：最多可申領16,000元。
(三) 年終獎金：每年有年終獎金(約1.5個月)。
(四) 醫勤獎助金：按月發放。
二、 保險：勞工保險與健保。
三、 工作時數：依本院「工作規則」及「勞動基準法」規定。
四、 其他福利：本院員工享有健保、住院期間享有病房費優待，本院門診掛號費、員工配偶及直系親屬亦享有特殊之醫療優待。
五、 休假方面：依本院「工作規則」及「勞動基準法」規定。
六、 住宿：有提供員工宿舍(床位有限，外縣市人員優先)，住宿無須付費，宿舍內部附設有衛浴設備、洗衣機、烘乾機、曬衣場、飲水機、電視機等設備。
七、 簽約：通過試用期(2~3個月)。

job_name: 【WL】聽力顧問-助聽輔具門市選配銷售_嘉義門市
company_name: 科林儀器股份有限公司
job_description:
<職位提供服務>
助聽器不僅止讓您聽得更清楚，它能成為您美好生活的點綴、作為生活態度的體現，濰樂聽力中心期望與您一起創造美好的樂活人生，每個精彩的時刻，濰樂都在您身邊。

<獲得成就>
提高顧客對聽覺與睡眠等疾病意識，有更好的生活品質

<成長機會>
無相關背景亦可，提供3個月嚴謹並專業的給薪培訓，課堂之外還配有資深小老師中長期輔導協助，考核通過成為專業選配師!通過考核後享高抽成獎金!

<工作內容>
1. 了解顧客的需求，操作醫院等級之儀器為顧客做聽力檢測了解其聽損程度
2. 顧問式銷售方式進行輔具推廣，改善其聽覺、睡眠品質
3. 助聽器裝配後之定期追蹤和關懷使用狀況、維護客情
4. 專業衛教服務與諮詢，讓顧客了解聽覺與睡眠對與生活的影響性

<期待特質>
★對門市諮詢、內勤業務銷售具熱忱者
★勇於挑戰：門店銷售業務經驗豐富、樂於追求高績效、具抗壓性
★服務熱忱：親切樂觀、善於與人互動和溝通傾聽
★主動積極、學習力高
★具備投入高成長潛力(醫療保健)產業的熱情
★助人為本，專業紮根以滿足健康需求

<關於團隊>
我們是一群樂在學習(醫療與儀器專業知識)、樂在服務(面對樂齡族耐心細心愛心)、樂在工作(職涯制度與人才培育計畫)的團隊，歡迎這樣的你一起加入濰樂聽力中心!


<About the Job>
Excitement is with me, and joy follows me! Enjoy good communication and a vibrant social life, unrestricted by age or hearing ability. Life is not limited to one form; live the life you want, pursue your dreams, and savor the beauty around you.

<Why We Have This Role>
Hearing aids not only help you hear more clearly but also enhance the beauty of your life and reflect your positive attitude. We at WiseLife Hearing Center hope to create a wonderful, vibrant life with you. For every exciting moment, WeiLe will be by your side.

<How You'll Find Success>
By raising awareness among customers about hearing and sleep disorders, leading to improved quality of life.

<How You Grow>
No prior background required; we provide 3 months of rigorous and professional paid training. In addition to classroom instruction, you'll receive long-term guidance from experienced mentors. Pass the assessment to become a professional fitting specialist and enjoy high commission bonuses!

<Things You Will Do>
1. Understand customer needs and use hospital-grade equipment to conduct hearing tests and assess hearing loss.
2. Promote hearing aids through consultative sales methods to improve auditory and sleep quality.
3. Provide regular follow-up and care after hearing aid fittings, maintaining customer relationships.
4. Offer professional health education services and consultations to help customers understand the impact of hearing and sleep on their lives.

<What We're Looking for on Your Resume>
- Passionate about in-store consultation and internal sales.
- Ready for challenges: experienced in store sales, enthusiastic about high performance, and resilient under pressure.
- Service-oriented: friendly, optimistic, and skilled in interaction and communication.
- Proactive and eager to learn.
- Passionate about the high-growth healthcare industry.
- Dedicated to helping others with a strong professional foundation to meet health needs.

<What You Should Know About This Team>
We are a team that loves learning (medical and equipment expertise), serving (with patience and care for the elderly), and working (with career development systems and talent cultivation plans). We welcome you to join WiseLife Hearing Center!
